84b8('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshad myed pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i rma
85a1('bum): tshad myed pa rnams la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
85a2('bum): tshe/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
85a3('bum): rnams gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
85a4('bum): par 'jug pa rnams ma lagasagazugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
85a5('bum): par 'jug pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub
85a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom
85a7('bum): ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la gnas par myi bgyi ste/
85a8('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par thard pa rnams rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyis stong ste/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang
85b1('bum): rnam par b.rad pa rnams ma lags rnam par tha rad pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar/
85b2('bum): pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
85b3('bum): par thard pa rnams la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
85b4('bum): mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams/ la gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar mthar kyis gnas
85b5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ ma bar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
85b6('bum): kyis stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma lags mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na yang stong
85b7('bum): pa nyid ma mchis pa/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang mabard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so//
85b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mthard kyis gnas pa
86a1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
86a2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
86a3('bum): de ni 'di ltar rnam par thad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dA/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong po nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa
86a4('bum): myed pas stong ste/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa
86a5('bum): nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ma lag sa rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa las gud na
86a6('bum): yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
86a7('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa
86a8('bum): rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
86b1('bum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar de bzhin
86b2('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnas
86b3('bum): ma lags de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs
86b4('bum): pa'i stobs rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
86b5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la gnas par myi brgya 'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha
86b6('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar myi 'jigs pa rnams myi 'jigs pa rnams kyis
86b7('bum): stong ste/ rgya 'jigs pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang myi 'jigs brgyas lags myi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ myi 'jigs pa nas
86b8('bum): kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi 'jigs pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
87a1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ myi 'jigs pa rnams la gnas par myi la rgya'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab
87a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar so so yang dag par
87a3('bum): rig pa rnams so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma lags
87a4('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na yang stong/ pa nyid ma mchis ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang so so yang
87a5('bum): dag par rig pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das na ma grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
87a6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab
87a7('bum): kyai pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po la gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byams pa chen po
87a8('bum): ni byams pa chen pos stong snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen pos stong ste/ bcom ldan 'das byams pa chen po'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang snying rje chen po'i stong pa nyid gang lag
87b1('bum): pa de yang byams pa chen po ma lags de yang snying rje chen po ma lags byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ byams pa chen po dang
87b2('bum): snying rje chen po yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das nam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab tu
87b3('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab
87b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas dkyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar
87b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la kyis stong ste/ sangs rgyakyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags
87b6('bum): pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
87b7('bum): rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das nas grangs des nA/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
87b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
88a1('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tsheyi ge rnams la gnas par myi bgyi ste/ yi ge mngon par sgrub pa la gnas par myi bgyi/ gcig
88a2('bum): 2tu brjod pa la gnas par mye bgyi gnyis su brjod pa la gnas par myi bgyi/ tha dad du brjod pa la gnas par myi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni
88a3('bum): 'di ltar yi ge rnams yi ge rnams kyis stong ste/ yi ge rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yi ge rnams ma lags yi ge rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/
88a4('bum): yi ge rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang yi ge rnam sa so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
88a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yi ge rnams la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan la ngas gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
88a6('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar mngon par
88a7('bum): shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mngon par shes pa rnams ma lags/ mngon par shes pa rnams
88a8('bum): las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang
88b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang
88b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo thams cad la gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na
88b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo rnams ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/ ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang ting nge 'dzind
88b4('bum): kyi sgo rnams ma lags ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo rnam sa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
88b5('bum): kyang ting 'dzind kyi sgo rnams so// bcom ldan 'ad/ sa rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
88b6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo thams cad la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol
88b7('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo
88b8('bum): rnams kyis stong ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma lags gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/
89a1('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/
89a2('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
89a3('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs myi rtag go zhes bgyi bar kan+da pA myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzug
89a4('bum): myi rtag pa nyid gzugs myi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs myi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs myi rtag pa nyid ma lags gzugs
89a5('bum): myi rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ gzugs myi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs myi rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam
89a6('bum): grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs myi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi brgya'o//
89a7('bum): des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba myi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba myi rtag
89a8('bum): pa nyid tshor ba myi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba myi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba myi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ tshor ba myi rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong
89b1('bum): pa nyid ma mchis ste/ tshor ba myi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba myi rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
89b2('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmo ba myi rtag go zhes babye bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du
89b3('bum): shes myi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes myi rtag pa nyid 'du shes myi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes
89b4('bum): myi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'dushe/ sa myi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ 'du shes myi rtag pa nyi dad las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ 'du shes
89b5('bum): myi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes myi rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/
89b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes myi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o//
89b7('bum): bam po bzhi pa'o// // des shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed myi
89b8('bum): rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed myi rtag pa nyid 'du byed myi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du 'byed myi rtag
90a1('bum): pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed myi rtag pa nyid ma lags 'du byed myi rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ 'du byed myi rtag
90a2('bum): kha pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed myi rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
90a3('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe'adu byed myi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa myi rtag go zhes bgyi bar
90a4('bum): gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ com ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa myi rtag pa nyid rnam par shes pa myi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/
90a5('bum): rnam par shes pa myi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lag/ sa pa de yang rnam par shes pa myi rtag pa nyid ma lags rnam par shes pa myi rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa
90a6('bum): nyid ma mchis ste rnam par shes pa myi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa myi rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub
90a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa myi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan
90a8('bum): 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/
90b1('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lag
90b2('bum): pa de yang gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
90b3('bum): kyang gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid do/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
90b4('bum): gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes par gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi brgya
90b5('bum): ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid
90b6('bum): kye stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong
90b7('bum): po nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
90b8('bum): pa'i tshe tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par
91a1('bum): myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes sdug
91a2('bum): bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ 'du shes sdug
91a3('bum): bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha
91a4('bum): rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes sdugabasngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
91a5('bum): 'du byed sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi ba gyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid 'du byed sdug bsngal
91a6('bum): ba nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid
91a7('bum): ma mchis ste/ 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa 'i stong pa'i kyi 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
91a8('bum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
91b1('bum): par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal
91b2('bum): ba nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid
91b3('bum): las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid lal stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das
91b4('bum): rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes
91b5('bum): bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'ad/ sa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
91b6('bum): gzugs bdag myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs bdag myed pa nyid gzugs bdag myed pa nyid kyis stong ste/
91b7('bum): gzugs bdag myed pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs bdag myed pa nyid ma lags gzugs bdag myed pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ gzugs
91b8('bum): bdag myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs bdag myed pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi
92a1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs bdag myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor
92a2('bum): ba bdag myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba bdag myed pa nyid tshor ba bdag myed pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba
92a3('bum): bdag myed pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba bdag myed pa nyid ma lags/ tshor ba bdag myed pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ tshor ba bdag myed
92a4('bum): pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba bdag myed pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
92a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tsho ra ba bdag myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
92a6('bum): 'du shes bdag myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes bdag myed pa nyid 'du shes bdag myed pa nyid kyis stong sa
92a7('bum): 'du shes bdag myed pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes bdag myed pa nyid ma lags/ 'du shes bdag myed pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ 'du
92a8('bum): shes bdag myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes bdag myed pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
92b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes bdag myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du
92b2('bum): byed bdag myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed bdag myed pa nyid 'du byed bdag myed pa nyid kyis stong ste/
92b3('bum): 'du byed bdag myed pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed bdag myed pa nyid ma lags 'du byed bdag myed pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ 'du
92b4('bum): byed bdag myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed bdag myed pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
92b5('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed bdag myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
92b6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa bdag myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa bdag myed pa
92b7('bum): nyid rnam par shes pa bdag myed pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes padang myed pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa bdag myed pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par
92b8('bum): shes pa bdag myed pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ rnam par shes pa bdag myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa bdag myed pa nyid do//
93a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes
93a2('bum): kha pa bdag myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
93a3('bum): po'i tshe/ gzugs zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs zhi ba nyid gzugs zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs
93a4('bum): zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs zhi bo nyid ma lags gzugs zhi bo nyid las gu da na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ gzugs zhe
93a5('bum): pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs zhi ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab
93a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor bzhi'o zhes bgyi
93a7('bum): bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba zhi ba nyid tshor ba zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa
93a8('bum): de yang tshor ba zhi ba nyid ma lags tshor ba zhi po nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ tshor ba zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba zhi ba nyid do// bcom
93b1('bum): ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor bzhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o//
93b2('bum): des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes zhe'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes zhi ba
93b3('bum): nyid 'du shes zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes zhi ba nyid ma lags/ 'du shes zhi ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis
93b4('bum): ste/ 'du shes zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong panyad kyang 'du shes zhi ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
93b5('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la skyo/ da pe'i tshe/ 'du shes zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas paramyi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
93b6('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed zhe'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed zhi ba nyid 'du byed zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du
93b7('bum): byed zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed zhi ba nyid ma lags/ 'du byed zhi ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ 'du byed zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid
93b8('bum): stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed zhi ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
94a1('bum): 'du byed zhe'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi brgya'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshernam par shes pa zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste
94a2('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang
94a3('bum): rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid ma lags rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa
94a4('bum): sa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par
94a5('bum): shes pa zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
94a6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs stong pa nyid gzugs stong pa nyid kyis
94a7('bum): stong ste/ gzugs stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs stong pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ gzugs
94a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha
94b1('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i gzugs spong ngo zhes bgyi b.ras ca// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'itshor ba stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par
94b2('bum): myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i gling du ne na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba stong pa nyid tshor bstong pa nyid kyis song ste/ tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tsho
94b3('bum): bstong pa nyid ma lags tshor ba stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'ang
94b4('bum): nam grangs dris na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas
94b5('bum): par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ dpa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes stong ngo zhes bgyi ra gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhen
94b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes stong pa nyid 'du shes stong pa nyid kyis stong de/ 'du shes stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes stong pa nyid ma lags
94b7('bum): shes stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ 'du shes stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das nam grangs des na/
94b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol
95a1('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed spong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed stong pa
95a2('bum): nyid 'du byed stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed stong pa nyid ma lags/ 'du byed stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma

95a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyend pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
95a5('bum): rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mya ba gyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid rnam par
95a6('bum): shes pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ma lags rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid las
95a7('bum): gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa song sa nyid/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang
95a8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa' la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
95b1('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs mtshan ma myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad
95b2('bum): du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs mtshan ma myed pa nyid gzugs mtshan ma myed pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs mtshan ma myed pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de
95b3('bum): yang gzugs mtshan ma myed pa nyid ma lags gzugs mtshan ma myed pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ gzugs mtshan ma myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa
95b4('bum): nyid kyang gzugs mtshan ma myed pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha
95b5('bum): rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs mtshan ma myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
95b6('bum): tshor ba mtshan ma myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba mtshan ma myed pa nyid tshor ba mtshan ma myed pa nyid kyis
95b7('bum): stong ste/ tshor ba mtshan ma myed pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba mtshan ma myed pa nyid ma lags tshor ba mtshan ma myed pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma
95b8('bum): mchis ste/ tshor ba mtshan myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba mtshan ma myed pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
96a1('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe tshor ba mtsham ma myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par gyi brgya'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu
96a2('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes mtshan ma myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes mtshan ma myed pa nyid 'du
96a3('bum): shes mtshan ma myed pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes mtshan ma myed pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes mtshan ma myed pa nyid ma lags/ 'du shes mtshan ma myed pa
96a4('bum): nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ 'du/ shes mtshan ma myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi / nga 'du shes mtshan ma myed pa nyid do// bcom ldan
96a5('bum): 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes mtshan ma myed
96a6('bum): do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed mtshan ma myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad
96a7('bum): du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed mtshan ma myed pa nyid 'du byed mtshan ma myed pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed mtshan ma myed pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang
96a8('bum): 'du byed mtshan ma myed pa nyid ma lags 'du byed mtshan ma myed pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ 'du byed mtshan ma myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang
96b1('bum): 'du byed mtshan ma myed pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
96b2('bum): 'du byed mtshan ma myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas
96b3('bum): par myi bgyi ste de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed pa nyid rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par
96b4('bum): shes pa mtshan ma myed pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed pa nyid ma pa gas/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed pa nyid las
96b5('bum): gung na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ rnam par na/ sa pa mtsham ma myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyi dkyang rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed pa nyid do//
96b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed
96b7('bum): de zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi badz+rI// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' dren rtsom sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sa spyod pa'i /
96b8('bum): gzugs smond pa myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par gyi yi gyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs smond pa myed pa nyid gzugs smond pa myed
97a1('bum): pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs smond pa myed pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs smond pa myed pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs smond pa myed
97a2('bum): pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ gzugs smond pa myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs smond pa myed pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs
97a3('bum): des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs smond pa myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o//
97a4('bum): des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba smond pa myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi ba/ gyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
97a5('bum): 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba smond pa myed pa nyid tshor ba smond pa myed pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba smon pa myed pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang
97a6('bum): tshor ba smon pa myed pa nyid ma lags tshor ba smond pa myed pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ tshor ba smond pa myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor
97a7('bum): ba spond pa myed pa nyid do/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
97a8('bum): tshor ba smon pa myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes smond pa myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi
97b1('bum): bgyi ste/ de ci'o slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes smond pa myed pa nyid 'du shes smond pa myed pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes smond pa myed pa nyid kyi
97b2('bum): stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes smond pa myed pa nyid ma lags/ 'du shes smond pa myed pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ 'du shes smon pa myed pa
97b3('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes smon pa myed pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi
97b4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes smon/ pa myed do zhes babye bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
97b5('bum): 'du byed spond pa myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'a sa de ni 'di ltar 'du byed smond pa myed pa nyid 'du byed
97b6('bum): smond pa myed pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed smond pa myed pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed smond pa myed pa nyid ma lags/ 'du byed smon pa myed pa nyid
97b7('bum): las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ 'du byed smond pa myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed smond pa myed pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des
97b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed smon pa myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi 'gyi'o//
98a1('bum): des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa smond pa myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhen
98a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa smond pa myed pa nyid rnam par shes pa smond pa myed pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa smond pa myed pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang
98a3('bum): lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa smond pa myed pa nyid ma lags rnam par shes pa smond pa myed pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ rnam par shes pa smon
98a4('bum): pa myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa smond pa myed pa nyid do// bcom lda// na 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa'
98a5('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa smon da pa myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi
98a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi
98a7('bum): bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs dben pa nyid gzugs dben pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa
98a8('bum): de yang gzugs dben pa nyid ma lags gzugs dben pa nyid las gud na yang stong po nyid ma mchis ste/ gzugs dben po nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs dben
98b1('bum): pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs
98b2('bum): dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhen
98b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba dben pa nyid tshor ba dben pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba dben pa nyid ma lags
98b4('bum): tshor ba dben pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ tshor ba dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba dben pa nyid do// bcom
98b5('bum): ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba dben no
98b6('bum): zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i srid du zhen/
98b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes dben pa nyid 'du shes dben pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes dben pa nyid ma lag
98b8('bum): 'du shes dben pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ 'du shes dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes dben pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs
99a1('bum): des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas
99a2('bum): kha par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'dra
99a3('bum): de ni 'di ltar 'du byed dben pa nyid 'du byed dben pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed dben pa nyid ma lags 'du byed dben
99a4('bum): pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ 'du byed dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed dben pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs
99a5('bum): des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi
99a6('bum): bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
99a7('bum): 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid rnam par shes pa'i dben pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa
99a8('bum): dben pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes
99b1('bum): pa dben pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par
99b2('bum): shes pa dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod par
99b3('bum): de bzhin nyid la gnas par myi bgyi stel/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/ de bzhin nyid kyi stong pa nyid
99b4('bum): gang lags pa de yang de bzhin nyid ma lags/ de ba bzhin nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ de bzhin nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin
99b5('bum): nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
99b6('bum): de bzhin nyid la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos
99b7('bum): nyid la gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos nyid chos nyid kyis stong ste/ chos nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos nyid
99b8('bum): ma lags chos nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub
100a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos nyid la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan
100a2('bum): kha yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings la gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/
100a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chos kyi dbyings
100a4('bum): las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyi ngas so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na
100a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan
100a6('bum): 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos skyon myed pa nyid la gnas par myi bgyi ste
100a7('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos skyon myed pa nyid chos skyon myed pa nyid kyis stong ste/ chos skyon myed pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos smon
100a8('bum): myed pa nyid ma lags/ chos skyon myed pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ chos skyon myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos skyon myed pa nyid do// bcom
100b1('bum): ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'ichos skyon myed pa nyid la gnas par gyi
100b2('bum): bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa' la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par
100b3('bum): myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha sa stong ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yang
100b4('bum): dag pa'i mtha' ma lags/ yang dag pa'i mtha' las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis ste/ yang dag pa 'i mtha' nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang yang dag pa'i/
100b5('bum): mtha'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
100b6('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
100b7('bum): myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gi bgyi bas gnas pa'i yid kyis gzugs la gnas na/ de gzugs mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
100b8('bum): la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu
101a1('bum): bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
101a2('bum): myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag tu
101a3('bum): bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis 'du shes la gnas na de 'du shes mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// bcom
101a4('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la skyo/ da pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu brgya
101a5('bum): ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis 'du bye de la gnas na/ de 'du byed mngon par 'du bkyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/
101a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag
101a7('bum): kir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i slad
101a8('bum): du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su zi nad par myi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
101b1('bum): phyind pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par myi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar myi
101b2('bum): 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas/ bdag
101b3('bum): tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis myig la gnas na/ de myig mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom
101b4('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang
101b5('bum): bdag gir bgyi la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ rna ba la gnas na/ de rnam mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyo/ dkyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi
101b6('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
101b7('bum): bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis sna la gnas na/ de sna mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do//
101b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi
102a1('bum): ba dang bdag gar bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis lce la gnas na/ de lce mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la myi
102a2('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu
102a3('bum): bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis lus la gnas na/ de lus mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do//
102a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya mkhas pas
102a5('bum): bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis yid la gnas na/ de yid mngon par 'du/ bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
102a6('bum): pa la myi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su zin
102a7('bum): par myi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par myi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa
102a8('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
102b1('bum): zabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis gzugs la gnas na/ de gzugs mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab
102b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
102b3('bum): bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis sgra la gnas na/ de sgra mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do//
102b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag
102b5('bum): tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyi sa dri la gnas na/ de dri mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
102b6('bum): la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
102b7('bum): bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis ro la gnas na/ de ro mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod/
102b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba
103a1('bum): ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis reg la gnas na/ de reg mngon par 'du brtse ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom
103a2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir
103a3('bum): bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis chos la gnas na/ de chos mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// de ci'i slad du
103a4('bum): zhe na mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byangang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind po yongs su zind par myi 'gyur
103a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par myi 'gyur te/ shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par ma
103a6('bum): gyu rad par rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
103a7('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag kwi bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis myig gau rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de
103a8('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
103b1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod palathabs kyi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rba rin pa shes pa la gnas na
103b2('bum): de rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
103b3('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis sna'i rnam par shes pa la gnas
103b4('bum): na de sna'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du ba gyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
103b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zab sa mya mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag
103b6('bum): gaur bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis lce'i rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de lce'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
103b7('bum): pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas
103b8('bum): pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gi re bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis lus kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de lus kyi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la
104a1('bum): spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
104a2('bum): kharold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas ma
104a3('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i
104a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa yongs su zi nad par myi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyi nad
104a5('bum): pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par myi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
104a6('bum): du 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas
104a7('bum): bas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis myig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas na de myig gi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod
104a8('bum): kyai shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
104b1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas na/ de rna ba'i 'dus te reg
104b2('bum): pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
104b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas/ bdug tu bsgre ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas tham yid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa la kan
104b4('bum): na de sna'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu sbyin pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
104b5('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang
104b6('bum): bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis lce'i 'dus te rog pa la gnas na/ de lce'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu
104b7('bum): phyi nad pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/
104b8('bum): bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yod kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas na/ de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi
105a1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la gyi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol pa tu phyind pas spyod pa'i
105a2('bum): zabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas na/ de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du
105a3('bum): bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
105a4('bum): shas rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa yongs su zind par myi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par myi
105a5('bum): 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa so ngas su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad ma khye nang po nyid du 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// bcom
105a6('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gan+da
105a7('bum): pa'i yid kyis myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
105a8('bum): pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
105b1('bum): bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de rna po'i 'dus te reg pa'i rtse nad kyis tshor ba mngon par
105b2('bum): 'du ba gyi ze la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
105b3('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la gnas
105b4('bum): na de sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshorab mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom
105b5('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 'chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'o// tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba
105b6('bum): ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod
105b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rom tu phyind pa la gyi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
105b8('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i sod kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la gnas na/
106a1('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
106a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid
106a3('bum): kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu
106a4('bum): phyi nad pa la myi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dang / la sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha
106a5('bum): rol tu phyind pas yongs su zind par myi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rnal 'byor la snyom sa par 'jug par myi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha
106a6('bum): rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur da par rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
106a7('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'iche/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis sa'i khams la gnas na de sal
106a8('bum): khams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
106b1('bum): rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis chu'i khams la gnas na de chu'i khams mngon par
106b2('bum): 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
106b3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gi re bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis mye'i khams la gnas na/ de mye'i khams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la
106b4('bum): spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab
106b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rlung gi khams la gnas
106b6('bum): na de rlung gi khams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
106b7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yod kyis nam mkha'i khams
106b8('bum): la gnas na de nam mkho'i khams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
107a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu la bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yod
107a2('bum): kyis rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas na/ de rnam par shes pa'i khams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// de ci'i slad
107a3('bum): du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su zind par myi 'gyur/ shes
107a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms pa// ra 'jug par myi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyurd par
107a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar myi 'gyu ra ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
107a6('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gaur bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis ma rig pa la gnas na/ de ma rig pa mngon par
107a7('bum): 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
107a8('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis 'du byed la gnas na/ de 'du byed mngon par 'du bgyi ba la
107b1('bum): spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i//
107b2('bum): tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la
107b3('bum): spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa
107b4('bum): zabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis mying dang gzu gas la gnas na/ de mying dang gzugs mngon
107b5('bum): bar 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan ladas gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
107b6('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gi re bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis skye mched drug
107b7('bum): la gnas na/ de skye mched drug mngon par 'du bgyi bu la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'i sos
107b8('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis reg pa la gnas na
108a1('bum): de reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
108a2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis tshor ba la gnas na
108a3('bum): de tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
108a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir ba gyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis sred pa la gnas na
108a5('bum): de sred pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bco ma ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
108a6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gaur bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis lend pa la gnas
108a7('bum): na de la nad pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
108a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gar bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis srid pa la gnas na/ de srid pa
108b1('bum): mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyi spyod / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
108b2('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod po'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir brtse ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis skye ba la gnas na/ de skye ba mngon par 'du bgyi
108b3('bum): ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das galan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
108b4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu debakri ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rga shi la gnas na/ de rga shi mngon par 'du bgyi ba
108b5('bum): la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon para'adu bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
108b6('bum): dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su zind par myi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rnal 'byor de la snyoms par 'jug par myi 'gyur te/
108b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyurd par rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
108b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis sbyin
109a1('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas na/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do//
109a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir
109a3('bum): bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas na/ de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi
109a4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
109a5('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bad ga gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas na/ de bzod pa'i pha
109a6('bum): rol tu phyind pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
109a7('bum): bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
109a8('bum): byind pa la gnas na/ de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/
109b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bkye ba dang bdag gir babye ba la gnas pa'i
109b2('bum): yid kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas na/ de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rgya
109b3('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'ibabs myi mkhas pas
109b4('bum): bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir brdzi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas na/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mngon
109b5('bum): bar 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol/ da tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// de rje'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
109b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su zind par myi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind po'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par bya
109b7('bum): 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyurd par rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro//
110a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
110a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis nang stong pa nyid
110a3('bum): la gnas na/ de nang stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
110a4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa 'tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi de ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis phyi
110a5('bum): stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de phyi stong pa nyid mngon pa ra 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ phyi nad pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
110a6('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gan
110a7('bum): ba'i snod kyis phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de phyi nang stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
110a8('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i
110b1('bum): yid kyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan
110b2('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba
110b3('bum): la gnas pa'i yid kyis chen po stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de chen po stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom
110b4('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' na po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'ithabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag
110b5('bum): gar bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis don dam pa stong pa/ nyid la gnas na/ de don dam pa stong pa nyid mngon/ bar 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol
110b6('bum): tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
110b7('bum): bdag tu bkye ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de 'dus byas stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi
110b8('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la mya spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi
111a1('bum): mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
111a2('bum): mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
111a3('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas na
111a4('bum): de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
111a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myaM mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir
111a6('bum): bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong po nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha
111a7('bum): rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas
111a8('bum): pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi
111b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
111b2('bum): myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de rang bzhin stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la
111b3('bum): snod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyimed pa la gyi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen poshes rab kyi sa ra mad tu phyind pa
111b4('bum): lo spyod pa'i tshe thabs kyi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas na
111b5('bum): de chos thams cad stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
111b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen / shes rab kyi sa 'alar tu phyin pa la spyod pa sa kyi ma 'as pas/ bdag ca gyi pa dang bdag
111b7('bum): gnas pa'i yid kyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la khyod k+Shi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
111b8('bum): kyi lung do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen thozhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pas spong pa'om babs rtse mkhas pas/ ba
112a1('bum): tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi
112a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
112a3('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yod kyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid mngon par
112a4('bum): 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu byand pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
112a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs rgyu/ mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir brgya ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la
112a6('bum): gnas na de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
112a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis dngos po myed
112a8('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do//
112b1('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su zind par myi 'gyur
112b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par myi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyurd par rnam pa thams cad
112b3('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thab sa
112b4('bum): myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gi bgyi ba la gnas po'i yid kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas na/ de dran pa nye bar gzhag
112b5('bum): pa rnams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mya spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod
112b6('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su zind par myi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rnal 'byor
112b7('bum): la snyoms par 'jug par myi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyu rad par rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro//
112b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba

113a3('bum): tu byind pa yongs su zind par myi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par myi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yongs

113a5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi/ ba dang bdag gar bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yod kyis
113a6('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas na/ de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do//

113b7('bum): de stobs rnams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sa
