145a3('bum): pa'i stobs bcu'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de de bzhin gshegs pa'i
145a4('bum): stobs bcu'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'am lags pa gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
145a5('bum): des ye shes de myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi nang du yang dag pa ra rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye
145a6('bum): shes de myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de myi 'jigs pa rnams ma lags pa gzhon du yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de
145a7('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi phyi rolod tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de so so yang
145a8('bum): dag par rig pa rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma lags pa gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des
145b1('bum): ye shes de snying rje chen po'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de snying rje chen po'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de snying rje chen po'i phyi nang du yang dag par
145b2('bum): rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de snying rje chen po ma lags pa gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi nang du yang dag par
145b3('bum): rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi phyi nang du yang
145b4('bum): dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags pa gzhan du yang yang / dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / des ye shes de rgyun
145b5('bum): tu zhugs po'i 'bras bu'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras drun phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes
145b6('bum): de rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma lags pa gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des
145b7('bum): shes dri la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / seM zhes de lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i phyi ro yod tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / e shes de
145b8('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma lags pa gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong po
146a1('bum): des ye shes de phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
146a2('bum): ye shes de phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma lags pa gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo /
146a3('bum): des ye shes de dgra bcom pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de dgra bcom pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de dgra bcom pa nyid kyi phyi
146a4('bum): nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de dgra bcom pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de rang byang chub kyi nang
146a5('bum): du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de rang bya nga chub kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de rang byang chub kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su
146a6('bum): ma mthong / ye shes de rang byang chub ma lags pa gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de lamo gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
146a7('bum): ye shes de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de lam bye rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de
146a8('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
146b1('bum): ye shes de rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye she
146b2('bum): de rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de de bzhin nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de de
146b3('bum): bzhin nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de de bzhin nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan du yang yang
146b4('bum): dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / des ye shes de ma nor pa de bzhin nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes des nor da pa de bzhin nyid kyi phyi rold tu yang dag
146b5('bum): par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de ma nor da pa de bzhi// na nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye// shes de ma nor pa de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan du
146b6('bum): yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid
146b7('bum): kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ye shes de gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ma lags
146b8('bum): ba gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de chos nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de chos nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
147a1('bum): ye shes de chos nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de chos nyid ma lags pa gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de
147a2('bum): chos kyi dbyings kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de chos kyi dbyings kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de chos kyi dbyings kyi phyi nang du yang dag par
147a3('bum): rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de chos kyi dbyings ma lags pa gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de chos kyi gnas nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
147a4('bum): ye shes de chos kyi gnas nyid kyi phyi rold tu yang dag pa ra rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de chos kyi gnas nyid kye phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes
147a5('bum): de chos kyi gnas nyid ma lags pa gzhan du yang yang da ga par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de chos skyon myed pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
147a6('bum): ye shes de chos skyon myed pa nyid kyi phyi rol da tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de chos skyon myed pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de chos skyon myed pa nyid
147a7('bum): ma lags pa gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de yang dag po'i mtha'i phyi rol tu yang
147a8('bum): dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de yang dag po'i mtha' ma lags pa gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su ma
147b1('bum): mthong ngo // rnam grangs 'di la kund tu rgyu ba phreng ba can mos par gyurd te/ de ltar mos par gyur nas dad po'i rjes su 'brang ba'am/ chos nyid tshad mar bgyis ste/ chos
147b2('bum): thams cad myi dmyigs pa'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ye shes la zhugs par gyur da te/ de de ltar mos par gyur nas des chos gang yang mtshan ma mchis pa dang / yid
147b3('bum): la bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i slad du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis te/ chos thams cad gzung du ma mchis gtang du ma mchis pa'i slad du yongs su gzung bar bgyi ba dang / gtang bar bgyi
147b4('bum): ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang des ma dmyigs ste/ chos thams cad la rlom sems ma mchis pa'i slad du de ni mya ngan las 'das pas kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba ma
147b5('bum): mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar gang tshes thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du gzugs yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / tshor ba
147b6('bum): yongs su 'dzind pa dang / 'du shes yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / 'du byed yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / chos thams cad
147b7('bum): yongs su bzung ba la ma mchis pa'i slad du/ myig yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / rna ba yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / sna yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / lce yongs su myi 'dzind pa
147b8('bum): dang / lus yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / yid yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ gzugs yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang /
148a1('bum): sgra yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / dri yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / ro yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / reg yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / chos yongs su myi 'dzind pa
148a2('bum): dang chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ myig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / sna'i
148a3('bum): rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs
148a4('bum): su myi 'dzind pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzu nga ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa yodas su myi 'dzind pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs
148a5('bum): su myi 'dzind pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi'o/ dzi nad pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi
148a6('bum): 'dzand pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su mya 'dzind pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ myig gi 'dus te reg po'i rkyend kyis tshor ba
148a7('bum): yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / lho'i 'dus te/
148a8('bum): reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yongs su
148b1('bum): ngas su kyi 'dzidzid pa dang / rlung gilas yongs su kyi 'azhin pa dang / rnam ma'a'i khams yongs su la 'i da / sa pa'i rnam po yongs su kyi
148b2('bum): thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis po'i slad du/ ma rig pa yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / 'du byed yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang
148b3('bum): mying dang gzugs yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / skye mched drug yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / reg pa yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang
148b4('bum): sred pa yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / lend pa yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / srid pa yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / skye ba yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / rga shil
148b5('bum): yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang // chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol
148b6('bum): tu phyind pa yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / bsam gtan
148b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / shes rab kyis ro la tu phyin pa yongs su kyi 'dzid pa dang / chos thams can yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ nang
149a1('bum): nyid yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mya
149a2('bum): 'dzind pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / 'dus ma byas/
149a3('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su snre la zhing pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su skye 'a nid pa dang / thog ma dang pas myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / dor ba skyed
149a4('bum): stong ba nyid yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / rang bzhin no drang pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / rang gi macan
149a5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzind pa dang / myeng gyi/ sa pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / dngos po myeng pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang /
149a6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid mongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / dngo po po skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / chos bams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i sa du/
149a7('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhan pa rnams yongs su po 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i mad du/ yang dag par 'ong ba nam sa yongs su kyi 'a mid pa dang /
149a8('bum): mtshad chom pa thas mamam pa'i mang du/ chu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su kyi 'dzin pa dang / sa sems cad sangs su 'azung bam mtsham pa'i ma du/
149b1('bum): da pa dang / byung dang/ pa'i
149b2('bum): mchis pa'i slad du/ tshad myed pa rnams yongs su s+ya 'dzind pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
149b3('bum): 'jug pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang /
149b4('bum): chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis
149b5('bum): pa'i slad du/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad
149b6('bum): du mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su mya 'dzind pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ ting nge 'dzind rnams yongs su mya 'dzind pa dang / chos
150a1('bum): thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du
150a2('bum): thade bzhin gshegs po'i stobs bcu yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis po'i slad du myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su mya 'dzind pa dang / chos thams
150a3('bum): cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ snying rje chen po
150a4('bum): yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi cho sa ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang /
150a5('bum): chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis po'i slad du
150a6('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang /
150a7('bum): chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis po'i slad du/ rang byang chub
150a8('bum): yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba
150b1('bum): ma mchis pa'i slad du/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzi nad pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis po'i slad du/ de bzhin nyid yongs su myi 'dzin
150b2('bum): pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ ma nor pa de bzhin nyid yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du
150b3('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ chos nyid yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / chos thams cad
150b4('bum): yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ chos kyi da ngas yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / chos thams cad yong sa su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ chos kyi gnas
150b5('bum): nyid yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / chos thams cad ngas su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ chos sgron myed po nyid yongs su mya 'a zhid pa dang / chos thams cad
150b6('bum): yongs su bzung ba ma mchis po'i slad du/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yongs su myi 'dzind pa 'di ni pha rol ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
150b7('bum): kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// /
150b8('bum): bam po / 'on kyang smon lam yongs su rdzogs kyi bar du bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las myi 'da'
151a1('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs dbang po lnga
151a2('bum): yongs su ma rdzogs stobs lnga yongs su ma rdzogs/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su ma rdzogs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ma rdzogs 'phags
151a3('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs/ bsam gtan bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs/ tshad myed pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs
151a4('bum): rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs maHrad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su ma rdzogs/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
151a5('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yongs su ma rdzogs mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs/ ting nge 'dzin de rnams yongs su ma rdzogs/ gzungs
151a6('bum): kyi sgo rnams yongs su ma rdzogs de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su ma rdzogs/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs/ so so yang dag par rag pa bzhi yongs su ma
151a7('bum): rdzogs snying rje chen po yongs su ma rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las myi 'da'o// do tsa'i sred
151a8('bum): du zhe na/ 'di ltar smon lam rnams ni smon lam ma lags/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma lags yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba ma
151b1('bum): lags/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ma lags/ dbang po rnams ni dbang po ma lags/ stobs rnams ni stobs ma lags/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
151b2('bum): ni byang chub kyi yan lag ma lags/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma lags 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden
151b3('bum): ba ma lags/ bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan ma lags/ tshad myed pa rnams ni tshad myed pa ma lags/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
151b4('bum): par 'jug pa ma lags/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams ni rnam par tha rad pa ma lags/ mthar kyis gnas pa 'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu naM/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i/
151b5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa ma lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smo nad pa myed pa ni rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo ma lags
151b6('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa ma lags/ ting nge 'dzind rnams ni ting nge 'dzin dam lags/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgom lags/ de bzhin gshegs
151b7('bum): po'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ma lags/ myi 'jigs pa rnams ni myi 'jigs pa ma lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa ma
151b8('bum): lags/ snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen po ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma lags ste/ de dag ni chos kyang ma lags/ chos ma lags pa
152a1('bum): yang ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba'i slad du/ gzugs yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin
152a2('bum): pa dang / 'du shes yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / 'du byed yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzind pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba'i slad du/

154a8('bum): dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
154b1('bum): 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di gang gi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni ci zhig/ ci'i phyir na de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu

158a3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba rnams myed cing myi dmyigs
158a4('bum): so/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so// dbang po rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so// stobs rnams/ myed cing myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
158a5('bum): myed cing mya dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan la/ ga brgyad pa myed cing myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid
158a6('bum): dang phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las
158a7('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong
158a8('bum): pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa
158b1('bum): bzhi myed cing myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so// tshad myed pa rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myed cing
158b2('bum): myi dmyigs so// rnam par thard pa brgyad myed cing myi dmyigs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myed cing myi dmyigs so// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
158b3('bum): dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa myed cing myi dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzin rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so//
158b4('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so// de ba zhen gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so// so so
158b5('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so// snying rje chen po myed cing myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so//
158b6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid
158b7('bum): dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang
158b8('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa
159a1('bum): nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myed cing myi dmyigs so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed cing rgya
159a2('bum): dmyigs so// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed cing myi dmyigs so// dgra bcom pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// rang byang chub myed cing myi dmyigs so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
159a3('bum): nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa
159a4('bum): nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po sto po nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dusabyas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
159a5('bum): dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
159a6('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
159a7('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ de bzhin nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid myed cing myi dmyigs
159a8('bum): so// chos nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// chos kyi dbyings myed cing myi dmyigs so// chos kyi gnas nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// chos skyon myed pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so//
159b1('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' myed cing myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'o bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen
159b2('bum): po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa
159b3('bum): nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos
159b4('bum): po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i yang myed cing myi dmyigs so// la nad
159b5('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba' yang myed cing myi dmyigs so// phyir myi 'ong ba yang myed cing myi dmyigs so// dgra bcom pa yang myed cing myi dmyigs so// rang sangs rgyas kyang
159b6('bum): myed cing myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa' yang myed cing myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyang myed cing myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang dmyigs su myad pa'i
159b7('bum): phyir/ nang stong pa nyid skyed cing myi dmyigs so// phyi dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ phyi stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// phyi nang dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ phyi nang stong pa nyid myed
159b8('bum): cing myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ chen po
160a1('bum): stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ don dam pa stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid
160a2('bum): dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so
160a3('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir
160a4('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so//
160a5('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir
160a6('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong
160a7('bum): pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed cing
160a8('bum): myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/
160b1('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
160b2('bum): pa'i tshe/ gal te de ltar rtog cing sems dpa' dang / de ltar rtog cing sems pa'i tshe/ sems zhum pa myed cing yongs su zhum pa myed la/ myi 'jigs myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur na
160b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa'/
160b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya// rab 'byor da kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni
160b5('bum): gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
160b6('bum): rab tu shes so// tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag po ji lta ba bzhin
160b7('bum): du rab tu shes so// 'du shes ni 'du shes kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta
160b8('bum): ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa
161a1('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol//
161a2('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig na myog gi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems
161a3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rna ba' ni rna ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' seMs
161a4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sna ni sna'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems
161a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi/ nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ra ba tu shes so// lce ni lce'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste
161a6('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// lus ni lus kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/
161a7('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yid ni yid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/
161a8('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs ni
161b1('bum): gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/
161b2('bum): sgra ni sgra'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//
161b3('bum): dri ni dri'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// ro na ro'i rang
161b4('bum): bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' se// mas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag po ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes
161b5('bum): so/ reg ni reg gi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba
161b6('bum): bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos ni chos kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
161b7('bum): du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ myig gi rnam par shes pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
161b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang
162a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sna'i rnam par shes pa ni snga'i
162a2('bum): rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//
162a3('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba
162a4('bum): bzhin du rab tu shes so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
162a5('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/
162a6('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ myig gi 'dus
162a7('bum): te reg pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag po ji lta ba bzhin du
162a8('bum): rab tu shes so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
162b1('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
162b2('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
162b3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang
162b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag po ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yod
162b5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa
162b6('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni myog gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/
162b7('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
162b8('bum): ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba
163a1('bum): bzhin du rab tu shes so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpal
163a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te
163a3('bum): reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag po ji lta ba bzhin du
163a4('bum): rab tu shes so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems
163a5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni yid kyi
163a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
163a7('bum): du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ so'i khams ni sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
163a8('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chul khams ni chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
163b1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mye'i khams ni mye'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
163b2('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sos
163b3('bum): dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/
163b4('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhi na du rab tu shes so// rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam pa
163b5('bum): shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
163b6('bum): du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa ni mi rig pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
163b7('bum): pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dA/
163b8('bum): tshe yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod
164a1('bum): pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mying dang gzugs ni mying dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
164a2('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems
164a3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// reg pa ni reg gi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems
164a4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag po ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tsho/ ra ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub
164a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sred pa ni sred pa'i rang bzhin dang bral
164a6('bum): ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// lend pa ni le nad pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba
164a7('bum): ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// srid pa ni srid pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste
164a8('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// skye ba ni skye ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang
164b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rga shi na rga shi'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub
164b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag po ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
164b3('bum): tu phyind pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta
164b4('bum): ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol pa tu phyind pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
164b5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// bzod pa 'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i
164b6('bum): rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa 'i lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// brtson 'grus
164b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
164b8('bum): yangabadag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
165a1('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang
165a2('bum): bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa/
165a3('bum): ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba
165a4('bum): bzhin du rab tu shes so// phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong po nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
165a5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ra nga bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa'
165a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba
165a7('bum): ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi
165a8('bum): rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// don dam pa stong pa nyid
165b1('bum): ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//

165b4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa s+ho/ dang pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub

165b6('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
165b7('bum): shes so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag
165b8('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
166a1('bum): pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems

166a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang
166a6('bum): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
166a7('bum): pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems
166a8('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i
166b1('bum): rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yang dag par spong ba bzhi
166b2('bum): ni yang dag par spong ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//
166b3('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab
166b4('bum): tu shes so// dbang po lnga ni dbang po'i rang bzhin dang bral ba// ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa

166b6('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol

167a4('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha

167a7('bum): gnas pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam par
167a8('bum): tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ni rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub

169b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po / smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu
169b2('bum): tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 'du shes kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 'du byed kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ myig gi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rna ba'i rang bzhin
169b3('bum): ni ji lta bu/ sna'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lce'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lus kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sgra'i rang bzhin ni ji
