169b5('bum): bu rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu lus kyi rnam par shes
169b6('bum): pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sna'i 'dus
169b7('bum): te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ myig gi 'dus
169b8('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu
170a1('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
170a2('bum): tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ mye'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu
170a3('bum): nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ ma rig pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 'du byed kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rnam par shes pa'i
170a4('bum): rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ mying dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ skye mched drug gi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu
170a5('bum): sred pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bul nad pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ srid pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ skye ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rga shi'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/
170a6('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu brtson 'grus kyi pha
170a7('bum): rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu// nang stong pa nyid kyi rang
170a8('bum): bzhin ni ji lta bu/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni
170b1('bum): ji lta bu/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ mtha' las 'das pa stong
170b2('bum): pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta
170b3('bum): bu/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dngos po myed pa
170b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyi da kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dran pa nye bar
170b5('bum): gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yang dag pa spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dbang po rnams
170b6('bum): kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu
170b7('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni pho lta bu/ bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin na rdo lta bu/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bru/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
170b8('bum): rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rnam par ba rad pa'i sgo stong pa /
171a1('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ gzungs
171a2('bum): kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi
171a3('bum): rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rgyun tu zhugs
171a4('bum): pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu dgra bcom pa nyid
171a5('bum): kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi rang
171a6('bum): bzhin ni ji lta bu/ de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chos nyid kyi rang bzhin
171a7('bum): ni ji lta bu chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chos kyi gnas nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chos skyon myed pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu
171a8('bum): rab 'byor da kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myad po / tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// 'du shes kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o//
171b1('bum): 'du byed kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin mi dngos po myed pa'omyig gi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed do// rna ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o/
171b2('bum): sna'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// lce'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// lus kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed po/ yid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni
171b3('bum): dngos po myed pa'o// sgra'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// dri'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// ro'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// reg gi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// chos kyi
171b4('bum): rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa
171b5('bum): rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed po/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang / bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i
171b6('bum): rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni
171b7('bum): dngos po myed pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po
171b8('bum): myed pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// sna'i 'dus te
172a1('bum): reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
172a2('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o//
172a3('bum): chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// mye'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin
172a4('bum): ni dngos po myed pa'o/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po byed blo/ sa rig bI ring bzhin dngos po phyed do/ du byed kyi rang bac+doMn dngos po myed blo// rna pa sle ba dang bzhini dngos po byed do/ bying dang gdug kyi rang bzhin ni ngom po skyed do// skye mched drug gi'
172a5('bum): rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// reg gi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myi da pa'o// sred pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o//
172a6('bum): lend pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// srid pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// skye ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// rga shi'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// sbyin pa'i
172a7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed
172a8('bum): pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
172b1('bum): pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed//
172b2('bum): pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// 'dus
172b3('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// thog
172b4('bum): dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa 'o// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po mya da pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos
172b5('bum): po myed pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// myi dmyigs pa stong
172b6('bum): pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po mya da pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po
172b7('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos
172b8('bum): po myed pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o//
173a1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// lam gyi ra bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o/
173a2('bum): bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// tshad myed pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed ma'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o//
173a3('bum): rnam par thard pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
173a4('bum): ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po mya da pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos de po myed pa'o// ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi rang bzhin ni
173a5('bum): dngos po myed pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// myi 'jigs
173a6('bum): pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// snying rje chen po'i rang
173a7('bum): bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// la nad cig phyir
173a8('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// rang byang chub kyi
173b1('bum): rang bzhin ni dngos po myed do/ las kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// de bzhin nyid kyi
173b2('bum): bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// ma nor pa de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// chos nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po
173b3('bum): myed pa'o// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// chos kyi gnas nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// chos skyon myed pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// yang dag
173b4('bum): pa'i mtho'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// tshe dang ldan ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar gzugs la gzugs kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / tshor ba la tshor ba'i
173b5('bum): rang bzhin myed pa dang / 'du shes la 'du shes kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / 'du byed la 'du byed kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin myed pa
173b6('bum): dang / myig la myig gi rang bzhin myed pa dang / rna ba la rna ba'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / snga la sna'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / lce la lce'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / lus la lus kyi rang bzhin myed pa
173b7('bum): dang / yid la yid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / gzugs la gzugs kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / spru la sna'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / dril dri'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / ro la ro'i rang bzhin myed
173b8('bum): pa dang / reg la reg gi rang bzhin myed pa dang / chos la chos kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa la myig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes
174a1('bum): pa la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa la sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa la lce'i rnam par shes
174a2('bum): pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa la lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / myig
174a3('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa la myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa la sna'i 'dus te reg
174a4('bum): pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / lus kyi dus te reg pa la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin myed
174a5('bum): pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yid kyi 'dus te re ga pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa 'i rkyend kyis tshor ba' la myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend
174a6('bum): kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor
174a7('bum): ba la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / lus
174a8('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tsho ba la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
174b1('bum): tshor ba'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / sa'i khams la sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / chu'i khams sa chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / kye'i 'ams la kye'i khams kyi rang bzhin myed
174b2('bum): pa dang / rlung gi khams la rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / na mkha'i khams la nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la rnam par shes pa'i khams
174b3('bum): kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / ma rig pa la ma rig pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / 'du byed la 'du byed kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang
174b4('bum): mying dang gzugs la mying dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / skye mched drug la skye mched drug gi rang bzhin myed pa dang / reg pa la reg pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / tshor
174b5('bum): bal tshor ba'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / sred pa la sred po'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / lend pa la lend pa'i rwa/ nga bzhin myed pa dang / srid pa la srid pa'i rang bzhin
174b6('bum): myed pa dang / skye ba la skye ba'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / rmashi la rga shi'i rang bzhin myed pa dang // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin myed
174b7('bum): pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang
174b8('bum): bzhin myed pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bsam gtan gyis
175a1('bum): rol tu phyi nad pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang // nang stong pa nyid la nang stong
175a2('bum): pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa' dang / phyi stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la
175a3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa
175a4('bum): dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyi dad kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang /
175a5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / thog ma dang tha mamyed pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa
175a6('bum): pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang /
175a7('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / myi dmyigs
175a8('bum): pa stong pa nyid la myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid
175b1('bum): kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dran pa nye bar
175b2('bum): gzhag pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang dag par spong ba'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang /
175b3('bum): dbang po rnams la dbang po'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / stobs rnams la stobs kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag gi rang bzhin myed pa dang / 'phag
175b4('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la lam gyi rang bzhin myed pa dang // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la 'phags pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / bsam gtan rnams
175b5('bum): la bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams la tshad myed pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gzugs myed
175b6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / rnam par thard pa brgyad la rnam par tha rad pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mthard kyis gnas
175b7('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin snyed pa dang / rnam par ba rang ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la/ rnam par ba rad pa'i sgo'i rang bzhin sbed pa dang
175b8('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par shes pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams la ting nge 'dzind kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gzungs kyi sgo'i rang bzhin
176a1('bum): myed pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi la myi 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin myed pa
176a2('bum): dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la so so yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / snying rje chen po la snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad
176a3('bum): la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres po'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rgyu nad tu zhugs po'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la lan
176a4('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / phyir/ myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhi na myed pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgra bcom pa nyid
176a5('bum): kye rang bzhin myed pa dang / rang byang chub la rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang /
176a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend po nyid la rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / de bzhin nyid la de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid la ma nor da pa
176a7('bum): de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid la gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin gyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / chos nyid la chos nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / chos kyi dbyings
176a8('bum): la chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / chos kyi gnas nyid la chos kyi gnas nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid la chos skyon myed pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / yang dag
176b1('bum): pa'i mtha' la yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin myed par shes par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i mu gzhan yang gzugs la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid myed do// tshor ba la tshor ba'i mtshan nyid
176b2('bum): myed do// 'du shes la 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid myed do// 'du byed la 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid myed do// rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// myig la myig gi mtshan nyid myed
176b3('bum): do// rna ba la rna ba'i mtshan nyid myed do// sna la sna'i mtshan nyid myed do// lce la lce'i mtshan nyid myed do// lus la lus kyi mtshan nyid myed do// yid la yid kyi mtshan nyid myed do//
176b4('bum): gzugs la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid myed do// sgra la spa'i/ mtshan nyid myed do// dril dri'i mtshan nyid myed do// rol ro'i mtshan nyid myed do// reg la reg gi mtshan nyid myed
176b5('bum): do/ chos la chos kyi mtshan nyid myed do// myig kau rnam par shes pa la myig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan tad myed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rna ba'i rnam par
176b6('bum): shes pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// sna'i rnam par shes pa la sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// lce'i rnam par shes pa la lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// lus kyi rnam par
176b7('bum): shes pa la lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa la myig gi 'dus te reg
176b8('bum): pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa la
177a1('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i/
177a2('bum): mtshan nyid myed pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la na
177a3('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid myed do// lce'i 'dus te
177a4('bum): reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend
177a5('bum): kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid myed do// yid kyi 'dus tereg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen da kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid myed do// sa'i khams
177a6('bum): la sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid myed do// chu'i khams la chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid myed do// mye'i khams la mye'i khams kyi mtshan nyid myed do// rlung gi khams la rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid
177a7('bum): myed do// nam mkha'i khams la nam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan nyid myang do// rnam par shes pa'i khams la rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid myed do// ma rig pa la ma rig pa'i
177a8('bum): mtshan nyid myed do// 'du byed la 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid myed do// rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// mying dang gzugs la mying dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid myed do/
177b1('bum): skye mched drug la skye mched drug gi mtshan nyid myed do// reg pa la reg pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// tshor ba la tshor ba'i mtshan nyid myed do// sred pa la sred pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// le nad pa la
177b2('bum): len pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// srid pa la srid pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// skye ba la skye ba'i mtshan nyid myed do// rga shi la rga shi'i mtshan nyid myed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa
177b3('bum): la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la
177b4('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha/ rol tu phyi nid pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// bsam gtan
177b5('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phye nad pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i mtshan nyid myed
177b6('bum): do// nang stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// phyi stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do//
177b7('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// chen po stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid
177b8('bum): kye mtshan nyid myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// mtha' las
178a1('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid
178a2('bum): myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid
178a3('bum): la chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la myi dmyigs pa
178a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// dngos po myed pa ste/ nga pa nyid la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
178a5('bum): mtshan nyid myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dang po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dran pa
178a6('bum): nye bar gzhag pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang dag par spong ba'i mtshan nyid myed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i mtshan nyid myed do/
178a7('bum): dbang po rnams la dbang po'i mtshan nyid myed do// stobs rnams la stobs kyi mtshan nyid myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag gi mtshan nyid myed do// 'phags
178a8('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la lam gyi mtshan nyid myed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// bsam gtan rnams la bsam gtan gyi mtshan
178b1('bum): nyid myed do// tshad myed pa rnams la tshad myed pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// rnam
178b2('bum): par tha rad pa rnams la rnam par thard pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid myed do//
178b3('bum): rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa la/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa'i mtshan nyid myed do//
178b4('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par shes pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// ting nge 'dzind rnams la ting nge 'dzind kyi ma tshan nyid myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gzungs kyi
178b5('bum): sgo'i mtshan nyid myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi mtshan nyid myed do// myi 'jigs pa bzhi la myi 'jigs pa'i mtshan nyid myed do/
178b6('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la so so yang dag par reg pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// byams pa chen po la byams pa chen po'i mtshan nyid myed do// snying rje chen po la snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid
178b7('bum): myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la sangs rgyas kyi chos kye mtshan nyid myed do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid myed du//
178b8('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid myed do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid myed do// dgra bcom pa nyid la dgra bco
179a1('bum): pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// rang byang chub la rang byang chub kyi mtshan nyid myed do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// rnam/
179a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// de bzhin nyid la de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// ma no da pa de bzhin la ma nor da pa de bzhin
179a3('bum): nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid la gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// chos nyid la chos nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// chos kyi dbyings la chos
179a4('bum): kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid myed do// chos kyi gnas nyid la chos kyi gnas nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// chos skyon myed pa nyid la chos skyon myed pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do//
179a5('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang dag po'i mtha'i mtshan nyid myed do// mtshan nyid la yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin myed do/ mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin la yang mtshan nyid kyi rang
179a6('bum): bzhin myed do// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/
179a7('bum): rab 'byor da kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du
179a8('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ma skyes ma byung ba'i phyir ro// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da ji ltar na chos
179b1('bum): thams cad ma skyes ma byung ba yin/ rab 'byor da kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs gzugs kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so//
179b2('bum): tshor ba tshor bas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// 'du byed
179b3('bum): 'du byed kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so//
179b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig myig gis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// rna ba rna bas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung
179b5('bum): ba yang myi dmyigs so// sna snas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// lce lces stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang
179b6('bum): myi dmyigs so// lus lus kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// yid yid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so//
179b7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs gzugs kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// sgra smras stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs
179b8('bum): so// dri dros stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// ro ros stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// reg reg gis stong ste/ de la
180a1('bum): skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// chos chos kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
180a2('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa myig gi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/
180a3('bum): de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa sna'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// lce'i rna
180a4('bum): par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pas ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// lu das kyi rnam par shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong
180a5('bum): ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyi gas so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba
180a6('bum): yang myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa myig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te
180a7('bum): reg pa rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs
180a8('bum): 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lus kyi 'dus te
180b1('bum): reg pas stong ste de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas spyong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang
180b2('bum): dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor bas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung
180b3('bum): ba yang myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so
180b4('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba sna'i 'dus te/ reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang / myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus
180b5('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
180b6('bum): kyis tshor ba lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te
180b7('bum): reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sa'i khams sa'i khams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang
180b8('bum): myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// chu'i khams chu'i khams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// mye'i khams mye'i khams kyis stong ste/
181a1('bum): de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// rlung gi khams rlung gi khams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so
181a2('bum): nam mkha'i khams nam mkha'i khams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong ste
181a3('bum): de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa ma rig pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so//
181a4('bum): 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyi gas 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi
181a5('bum): dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// mying dang gzug/ sa mying dang gzugs kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// skye mched
181a6('bum): drug skye mched drug gis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// reg pa reg pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung bcwa myi dmyigs so//
181a7('bum): tshor ba tshor bas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// sred pa sred pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// lend pa
181a8('bum): lend pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// srid pa srid pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// skye ba skye bas
181b1('bum): stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// rga shi rga shis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
181b2('bum): bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshul khrims
181b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi
181b4('bum): dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang
181b5('bum): myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so//
181b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid nang
181b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigaso
181b8('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid phyin stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la
182a1('bum): skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so/
182a2('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skyes pa yang skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong
182a3('bum): ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigaso
182a4('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'bru nga ba yang myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed
182a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis sto// nga ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyi gas so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dor ba myed pa stong
182a6('bum): pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi
182a7('bum): dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan
182a8('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs
182b1('bum): 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid
182b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye
182b3('bum): ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs
182b4('bum): 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba rnams da yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul
182b5('bum): byi rkang pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba myi dmyigs so// dbang po rnams dbang po rnams kyis stong ste/ de la
182b6('bum): skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// stobs rnams stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
182b7('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas
182b8('bum): stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mya dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba
183a1('bum): yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan rnams bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so//
183a2('bum): tshad myed pa rnams tshad myed pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzugs pa'i snyoms
183a3('bum): par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par thard pa brgyad kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs
183a4('bum): 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// mthar da kyis gnas/ pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyo/ mas par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba
183a5('bum): yang myi dmyigs so// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa
183a6('bum): dang / smond pa myed pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// mngon patsA pa rnams mngon pan+de pa rnaMs kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang
183a7('bum): myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzind rnams ting nge 'dzind rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// gzud kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/
183a8('bum): de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang
183b1('bum): myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa rnams myi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig
183b2('bum): pa rnams so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// byams pa chen po byams pa chen pos stong ste/ de la skye ba yang
183b3('bum): dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// snying rje chen po snying rje chen pos stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad
183b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
183b5('bum): rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mya dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
183b6('bum): bus stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang
183b7('bum): myi dmyigs so// dgra bcom pa nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigaso rang byang chub rang byang chub kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba
183b8('bum): yang myi ra myig 'byung ba snga myi dmyigasol kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
184a1('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid
184a2('bum): kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi
184a3('bum): dmyigs so// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// chos nyid chos nyid kyis stong ste/
184a4('bum): de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so/ chos kyi dbyings chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// chos
184a5('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid chos kyi gnas nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang mya dmyigs so// chos skyon myed pa nyid chos skyon myed pa nyid kyis stong ste
184a6('bum): de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// tshe dang
184a7('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang nye ba yin te/ de ji lta ji ltar
184a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan ma yongs su dag pa
184b1('bum): thob par 'gyur ro// de ji lta ji ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par gyur pa de de ltar byang
184b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems myi skyed do// zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems myi skyed do// gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems skyed do// nga rgyal dang ldan pa dang
184b3('bum): spu dang / g.yo dang ldan pa dang / phrag dog dang ser sna dang ldan pa dang / sred pa dang ldan pa dang / lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems myi skyed do// de 'dod chags kyi sems myi skyed cing / zhe sdang
184b4('bum): dang gti mug dang nga rgyal dang sku dang g.yol dang / phrag do ga dang / ser sna dang sred pa dang lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems myi skyed pas/ nam yang ma'i mngal du skye bar myi 'gyur te/
184b5('bum): khor zug rtag par rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i don ma gtogs par nam yang nga na song rnams su skye bar myi 'gyur ro// de sems
184b6('bum): can yongs su smyind par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ nam bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
184b7('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar myi 'gyur ro// de bas na tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
184b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan dang legs pa 'di dag thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa 'di nyid la brtson 'grus mya gtang bar spyad par bya ste/
185a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du nye bar
185a2('bum): gyur pa yin no// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u lnga pa'o//
185a3('bum): kyi sa sbyid pa song zag rgyu/ sa med ldan pa
185a4('bum): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom lnga na 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ babs
185a5('bum): myi mkhas pas/ gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te tshor ba la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te 'du shes la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te 'du byed la spyod na mtshan
185a6('bum): ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
185a7('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ gzugs rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind

187b8('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zab kyi mkhas pas 'du byed zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
188a1('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ 'du byed
188a2('bum): kham zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
188a3('bum): 'du byed dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi
188a4('bum): mkhas pas/ 'du byed dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtsha na ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
188a5('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
188a6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
188a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa bde zhes par bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
188a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal
188b1('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mye mkhas pas
188b2('bum): rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
188b3('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa bdag byed rje bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
188b4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya mkhas pas/ rnam parashes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bco ma ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
188b5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa ma zh-i zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
188b6('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
188b7('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa myi dben
188b8('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/
189a1('bum): myig rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
189a2('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas/ myig myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
189a3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ myig bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
189a4('bum): phye nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya mkhas pas/ myig bsdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
189a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ myig bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan

193a4('bum): rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' na po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe

193b4('bum): mo zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

194a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ swa ba de zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
194a2('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya mkhas pas/ sgra sdug bsngal zhes pagyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
194a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ smra bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
194a4('bum): la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas// sna
194a5('bum): bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
194a6('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ smra zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
194a7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ smra ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
194a8('bum): tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya mkhas pas/ sgra'i dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
194b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas/ sku gyi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod namatshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
194b2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ babs myi mkhas pas/ dri rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
194b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ dri myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub seMs
194b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ dri bde na sa bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan

201a2('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i

207a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
207a7('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byung
207a8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi dben zhes bgyi bar
207b1('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rje/ thabs kyi mkhas pas/ rna ba'i 'dus
207b2('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
207b3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
207b4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa mo/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar gyod na mtshan ma
207b5('bum): la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ rna ba
207b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
207b7('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems

208a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
208a2('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
208a3('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba mo zhe zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

208a6('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
208a7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
208a8('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor gyi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
208b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba
208b2('bum): bde zhes bgyi bar sdod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'ichi/ thabs myi mkhas

208b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//

208b7('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

213a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ zabs myi mkhas pas/ mye'i khams bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
213a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ mye'i khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
213b1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ mye'i khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// @
213b2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i che/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ mye'i khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/
213b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ mye'i khams myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na
213b4('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
213b5('bum): rlung gi khams rtag ces bgyi bar gyod na mtshan ma la skyo/ da do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
213b6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ rlung gi khams myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
213b7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zabs myi mkhas pas/ rlung gi khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
213b8('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ rlung gi khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
214a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ rlung gi khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod

214a3('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ rlung gi khams
214a4('bum): zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ na po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
214a5('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas/ rlung gi khams mo zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
214a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ rlung gi khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
214a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ rlung gi khams myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
214a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ nam mkha'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar gyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan

214b3('bum): bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/

215a1('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs

219b6('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
219b7('bum): reg pa myi rtag ces bgyi bar sdod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ babs
219b8('bum): myi mkhas pas/ reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
220a1('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas/ reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
220a2('bum): kha kye pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
220a3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zabs myi mkhas pas/ reg pa bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
220a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
220a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la s+yo/ da pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ reg pa ma zhe
220a6('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas
220a7('bum): pas/ reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'itshe/
220a8('bum): zabs myi mkhas pas/ reg pa myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
220b1('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
220b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ tshor ba myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' seMs
220b3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
220b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pa sa/ tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
220b5('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol/ tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
220b6('bum): tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi
220b7('bum): mkhas pas/ tshor ba bdag myed ces bgyi bar stod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
220b8('bum): la spyod po'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas/ tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
221a1('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpal/
221a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
221a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ tshor po mye dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
221a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la skyo/ da pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ sred pa
221a5('bum): rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bco ma ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
221a6('bum): po'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ sred pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
221a7('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ sred pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
221a8('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ sred pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das

221b2('bum): do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ sred pa bdag myed ces
221b3('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zabs myi mkhas
221b4('bum): pas/ sred pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
221b5('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zabs myi mkhas pas/ srid pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
221b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ sred pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
221b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ sred pa myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod ma mtshan ma la spyod //
221b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ le nad pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na

222a2('bum): pas/ lend pa myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
222a3('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mya mkhas pas/ lend pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
222a4('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zabs myi mkhas pas/ lend pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod nam/ tshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
222a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyipha rol tu phyind pa la sdod pa'i tshe/ thabs mye ma khas pas/ len pa bdag ces bkye bar spyod na
222a6('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ len
222a7('bum): pa bdag myed ces bgyi bar sbyong na mtshan ma la snod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la sdong po'i tshe
222a8('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas/ lend pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
222b1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ lend pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
222b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ le nad pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
222b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ len pa myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/

224a5('bum): tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ rga shi myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems

224b2('bum): myed ces bgyi bar sdod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mtha

224b4('bum): zabs myi mkhas pas rga shi ma zhe zhes bgyi ba/ ra spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das pa/ la te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
224b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zab sa myi mkhas pas/ rga shi dben zhes bgyi bar skyo da na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/

224b8('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zabs myi mkhas pas/
225a1('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi

225a5('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab

225b1('bum): tu phyi nad pa mo zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i

225b4('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes// rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zabs/ myi mkhas pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind
225b5('bum): pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la sdod do// brtsam ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i

225b7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan

226a1('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
