226a5('bum): tu phyi nad pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
226a6('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
226a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan la sdod do//
226a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind
226b1('bum): ba myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myong pa'i
226b2('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
226b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa mye rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
226b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkha sa pas/ bzod 'ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa bde
226b5('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom lda na 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
226b6('bum): tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
226b7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'dra
226b8('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod
227a1('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
227a2('bum): 9bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
227a3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma zha zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
227a4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
227a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa 'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bzod pa'i pha
227a6('bum): rol tu phyind po myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
227a7('bum): zabs myi mkhas pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
227a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag ces bgyi'i bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
227b1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa la spyod pa'i rje/ bdas kyi mkhas pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar/
227b2('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
227b3('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
227b4('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pasabartson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag ces bgyi ba spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
227b5('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bzon 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
227b6('bum): pa bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
227b7('bum): myi mkhas pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
227b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bcom 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
228a1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben
228a2('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas
228a3('bum): pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
228a4('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bas gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa rtag ces bgyi ba ra spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
228a5('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shwa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyi nad
228a6('bum): pa myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
228a7('bum): myi mkhas pas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
228a8('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/
228b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod/
228b2('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bsam gtan
228b3('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
228b4('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bas ma gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhe zhes bgyi bar spyod/ na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
228b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zab sa myi mkhas pas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
228b6('bum): phyi nad pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
228b7('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
228b8('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bas gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
229a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ shes rab
229a2('bum): kye pha rol tu phyind pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
229a3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
229a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na
229a5('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bya/ dra chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi
229a6('bum): mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa chen po shes rab kyi
229a7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la gyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
229a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed ces bgyi bar
229b1('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod po'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
229b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
229b3('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zabs myi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mo zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
229b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben zhes dgyi
229b5('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'ad/ sa gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
229b6('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi dben zhes bgyi bar myong na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
229b7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
229b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la skyod po'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ nang stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bgyi bar myod na mtshan ma la gyor
230a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ nang stong pa nyid
230a2('bum): bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi

230a4('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
230a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phya nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ nang stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la

230b3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ phyi stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te

230b6('bum): nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

231a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ phyi stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//

231a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ phyi stong pa nyid myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom

231b1('bum): phye nang stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i

231b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma

231b6('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la sdod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
231b7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ phye nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

232a1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi/

232a4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ stong pa nye da stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la s+ho dad do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems

232a8('bum): po'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
232b1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
232b2('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod
232b3('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ stong
232b4('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
232b5('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na ma tshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
232b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na
232b7('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
232b8('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
233a1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ chen po stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
233a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ chen po stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la sdod do//
233a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ chen po stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi
233a4('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

246b8('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ dbang po rnams rtag ces bgyi bar gyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dang /
247a1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya mkhas pas/ dbang po rnams myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do
247a2('bum): kha bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya mkhas pas/ dbang po rnams bde zhes bgyi
247a3('bum): bar gyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'ad sa gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ babs myi
247a4('bum): mkhas pas/ dbang po rnams sdug bsngal zhes pa gyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'ad/ sa gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
247a5('bum): po shes rabo kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod po'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ dbang po rnams bdag ces pa gyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
247a6('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ dbang po rnams bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod
247a7('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ dbang
247a8('bum): po rnams zhe zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod po'i tshe/ thabs
247b1('bum): myi mkhas pas/ dbang po rnams mo zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
247b2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zabs myi mkhas pas/ dbang po rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
247b3('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ dbang po rnams myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
247b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mya ma khas pas/ stobs rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na
247b5('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod po'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
247b6('bum): stobs rnams myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod po'i tshe/
247b7('bum): skabs kyi mkhas pas/ stobs rnams bde zhes bkye bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du
247b8('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ stobs rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar gyod na mtshan ma la gyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sos
248a1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thab sa mya mkhas pas/ stobs rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la rtsod do// bcom
248a2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ stobs rnams bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod
248a3('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ stobs
248a4('bum): rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
248a5('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ stobs rnams ma zhe zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// brtso ma ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
248a6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod po'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ stobs rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
248a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ stobs rnams myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
248a8('bum): do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ byang chub kyi yan lag
248b1('bum): rnams rtag ces bgyi bar gyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i cha
248b2('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi rtag ces bgyi bar gyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
248b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya mkhas pas/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
248b4('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
248b5('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod// do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dang la sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
248b6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dang
248b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
248b8('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ byang chub kyi
249a1('bum): yan lag rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
249a2('bum): phyi nad pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ zabs mye mkhas pas/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mo zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
249a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
249a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'o// tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ byang chub kyi yan
249a5('bum): lag rnams myi dben zhes par spyod na mtshan ma la s+yo da do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dang pal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
249a6('bum): byind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
249a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad po myi rtag ces bgyi
249a8('bum): bar gyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas
249b1('bum): pas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bde zhes bgyi bar gyod na mtshan ma la gyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
249b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
249b3('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag
249b4('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
249b5('bum): babs myi mkhas pas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
249b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zabs myi mkhas pas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhi zhes bgyi bar gyod na mtshan ma
249b7('bum): la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ 'phags pa'i lam
249b8('bum): yan lag brgyad pa ma zhi zhe gyi bar gyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
250a1('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
250a2('bum): 2chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ za ba myi mkhas pas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la gyod do//
250a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' ses
250a4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'o/ tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
250a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mya
250a6('bum): rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la gyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs myi mkhas pas
250a7('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
250b1('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
250b2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la gyod do// bcom

250b4('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod po'i tshe/

250b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mo zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
250b7('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod

251a1('bum): bden pa rnams myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang

251a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro/ da lad tu phyind pa la spyod po'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pa sa/ bsam gtan rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod

251a7('bum): pa la smod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bsam gtan rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
251a8('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bsam gtan rnams bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das

251b2('bum): do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bsam gtan rnams ma zhi
251b3('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas
251b4('bum): pas/ bsam gtan rnams dben zhes bgyi bar gyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bya nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
251b5('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ bsam gtan rnams myi dben zhes bgyi bar s+yo da na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
251b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod po'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ tshad myed pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//

251b8('bum): gyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod po'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ tshad myed
252a1('bum): pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod po'i

252a6('bum): tshad myed pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe
252a7('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas/ tshad myed pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
252a8('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zabs myi mkhas pas/ tshad myed pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
252b1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ tshad myed pa rnams myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
252b2('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces
252b3('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas
252b4('bum): pas/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam sa myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
252b5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ gzugs mye da pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar
252b6('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// zabs mya mkhas las/ gzugs myed pa la snyams par 'jug pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
252b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zabs myi mkhas pas/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do
252b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
253a1('bum): pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod

253a4('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zabs myi mkhas pas
253a5('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma zhe zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
253a6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod po'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
253a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod po'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
253a8('bum): 'jug pa rnams myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do'// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
253b1('bum): gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ rnam par thard pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
253b2('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
253b3('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na
253b4('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bya/ nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkha
253b5('bum): pas/ rnam par ba rad pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
253b6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ rnam par thard pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la gyod do// bcom ldan
253b7('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams bdag myed ces bgyi ba
253b8('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ rnam
254a1('bum): par tha rad pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
254a2('bum): khapa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya mkhas pas/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
254a3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod po'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la gyod do// bcom ldan
254a4('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod po'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ rnam par thard pa rnams
254a5('bum): myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do bcu ma ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i
254a6('bum): tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpal
254a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myi rtag ces bgyi bar gyod na mtshan
254a8('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i
254b1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'o//
254b2('bum): tshe/ thabs mya mkhas pas/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
254b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bdag ces bgyi bar spyod
254b4('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bya ngang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod po'i tshe/ thabs myi mtha
254b5('bum): pas/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jugapa dgu bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
254b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
254b7('bum): la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ mabard kyis gnas pa'i
254b8('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyor
255a1('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ mthar dkyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
255a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myi dben zhes bgyi
255a3('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
255a4('bum): rnam par thar da pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
255a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod po'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed
255a6('bum): pa dang / smond pa myed pa myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpe 'a sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
255a7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
255a8('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ rnam par tha rad po'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
255b1('bum): ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar gyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
255b2('bum): phyi nad pa la myod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
255b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
255b4('bum): dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
255b5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'otshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond
255b6('bum): pa myed pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
255b7('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas/ rnam par ba rang po'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
255b8('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ rnam par tha rang po'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed/
256a1('bum): pa dang / smond pa myed pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
256a2('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya mkhas pas/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
256a3('bum): gyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ mngon par shes pa nas
256a4('bum): rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bco/ ma ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dang da' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i
256a5('bum): tshe/ zabs myi mkhas pas/ mngon par shes pa rna mas myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' seMs
256a6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'dra
256a7('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar
256a8('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
256b1('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la
256b2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ mngon par shes pa rnams bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
256b3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
256b4('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyong po'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas/ mngon par shes pa rnams ma zhi zhes
256b5('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/
256b6('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas/ mngon pa shwe ba rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
256b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ mngon par shes pa rnams myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
256b8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ ting nge 'dzin nams rtag ces bgyi bar gyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
257a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ ting nge 'dzind nas//
257a2('bum): myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi
257a3('bum): mkhas pas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
257a4('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod po'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ ting nge 'dzind rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
257a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rabo kyi/ pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi ma khas pas/ ting nge 'dzind rnams bdag ces bgyi
257a6('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/
257a7('bum): ting nge 'dzind rnams bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod
257a8('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ ting nge 'dzind rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
257b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ ting nge 'dzind rnams ma zha zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
257b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ ting nge 'dzind rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
257b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyi nad pa la spyod po'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ ting nge 'dzind rnams myi dben
257b4('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
257b5('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtagaces bgyi bar gyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom lda na 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
257b6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi rtag ces bgyi bar gyod na mtshan ma la gyod do// bcom ldan 'das
257b7('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bgyi bar gyod na mtshan
257b8('bum): sa la gyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas/ gzungs kyi sgo
258a1('bum): rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa
258a2('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
258a3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
258a4('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi ma khas pas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod
258a5('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkha
258a6('bum): pas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind
258a7('bum): pa la sdod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
258a8('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod po'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mya dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
258b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pal gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na
258b2('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ de bzhin
258b3('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
258b4('bum): gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na maHna ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
258b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pa/ sa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sdug bsngal
258b6('bum): zhes bgyi bar myod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyong pa'i tshe/ thabs su ma'as/
258b7('bum): pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
258b8('bum): rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag myed ces bgyi bar gyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bya
259a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhi zhes
259a2('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
259a3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la gyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyim
259a4('bum): pa la gyong po'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
259a5('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
259a6('bum): myi dben zhes bgyi bar gyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
259a7('bum): myi mkhas pas/ myi 'jigs pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
259a8('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ myi 'jigs pa rnams myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
259b1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ babs kyi mkhas pas/ mye 'jigs pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la gyod do// bcom ldan 'dra/
259b2('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar

259b4('bum): mya 'jigs pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshanam la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chupa sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
259b5('bum): rol tu phyind pa la gyod po'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ myi 'jigs pa rnams bdag myed ces bgyi ba/ ra spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
259b6('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ myi 'jigs pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
259b7('bum): la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya mkhas pas/ myi 'jigs pa rnams
259b8('bum): ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod po'i tshe/ thabs mye mtha/
260a1('bum): pas/ myi 'jigs pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
260a2('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ myi 'jigs pa rnams myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
260a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na
260a4('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bya/ nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod po'i tshe/ thabs myi
260a5('bum): mkhas pas/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mye rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' seMs
260a6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bde zhes brtse bar spyod ma mtshan ma la byed ro// bcom
260a7('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs skye mkhas pas/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug
260a8('bum): bsngal zhes bgyi bar gyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ babs
260b1('bum): gyi mkhas pas/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams pa ga ces bgyi bar gyon mamatshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes
260b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thabyas kyi mkhas pas/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag myed ces bgyi bar myod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
260b3('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar
260b4('bum): spyod ma mtshams la sdod do// bcom ldan 'das gas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ma zhes sa kyi pha rol tu phyin pal gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
260b5('bum): myi mkhas pas/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnam sa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar gyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
260b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod po'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la pyod
260b7('bum): do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zabs mya mkhas pas/ so so yang dag par rig pa
260b8('bum): rnams myi dben zhes bgyi bar gyod na mtshan ma la pyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myong pa'i tshe
261a1('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas/ snying rje chen po rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
261a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ snying rje chen po myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
261a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ snying rje chen po bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
261a4('bum): do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa la sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod po'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
261a5('bum): snying rje chen po sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtsha na ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byangachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
261a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la stong po'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ snying rje chen po bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
261a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ snying rje chen po bdag myed ces bgyi bar gyod na mtshan ma la gyod do//

261b5('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa

297b5('bum): myi myod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi myod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin da pa smond pa yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha
297b6('bum): rol tu phyind pa smond pa myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dben zhes bya bar myi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi dben zhes bya bar myi spyod pa dang /
297b7('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi gyod de/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i mtshan ma la myi spyod cing / bzon 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rtag ces bya bar mye gyod
297b8('bum): brtsod 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gyi rtag ces bya bar gyi gyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bde zhes bya bar gyi gyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa krug bsngal
298a1('bum): bya bar myi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ brtson
298a2('bum): kha 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhi zhes bya bar myi gyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong zhes bya bar myi gyod
298a3('bum): can 'grus rgyam lag tu rgyan dal mya ltang zhes bya bar rgya kya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi stong zhes bya bar myi gyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mtshan ma
298a4('bum): yod ces bya bar mye spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ bco na 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa smond pa yod ces bya
298a5('bum): bar myi gyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa smond pa myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dben zhes bya bar myi myod
298a6('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi dben zhes bya bar myi spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod da/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind po'i mtshan ma la
298a7('bum): myi sdod cing bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa rtag ces bya bar myi gyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag ces bya bar myi gyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind
298a8('bum): pa bde zhes bya bar myi spyod bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ bsam
298b1('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed ces bya ba myi gyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma zhi zhes bya bar myi
298b2('bum): gyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong zhes bya bar myi gyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi stong zhes bya bar myi gyor/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa mtshan
298b3('bum): ma yod ces bya bar myi gyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi myod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa smond pa yod ces bya bar myi gyod/
298b4('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa smond pa myed ces bya bar gyi gyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben zhes bya bar gyi myod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol
298b5('bum): tu phyind pa myi dben zhes bya bar myi spyod pa dang / sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i mtshan ma la myi gyod cing
298b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag ces bya bar myi gyong / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bde zhes bya bar myi sdod
298b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag ces bya bar myi rtsod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed ces bya bar
298b8('bum): myi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong zhes bya bar
299a1('bum): myi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myi stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
299a2('bum): phyind pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa smond pa yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa smond pa myed ces bya bar myi spyod
299a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben zhes bya bar myi myod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi dben zhes bya bar myi spyod pa dang //
299a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zag brgyamanang stong pa nyid la myi rtsod de/ nang stong pa nyid kyi
299a5('bum): ma la myi gyod cing / nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar myi myod/ nang stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar myi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid sdug
299a6('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ nang stong po nyid zha' zhes bya bar myi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid
299a7('bum): ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid myi stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid
299b1('bum): mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi gyod/ nang stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar myi gyod/ nang stong pa nyid smon pa myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar myi gyod/
299b2('bum): nang stong pa nyid myi dben zhes bya bar myi gyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la myi spyod de/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mye spyod cing / phyi stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ phyi stong pa
299b3('bum): nyid myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar myi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid
299b4('bum): bdag myed ces bya bar myi myong/ phyi stong pa nyid zhi zhe/ sa bya bar myi gyod/ phyi stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi gyod/ phyi stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar myi spyod
299b5('bum): phyi stong pa nyid myi stong zhes bya bar myi gyod phyi stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi gyod/ phyi stong pa nying mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi spyod phyi stong pa
299b6('bum): nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid smond pa myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar myi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid myi dben zhes bya bar myi spyod pa
299b7('bum): dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la myi spyod de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la myi spyod cing / phyi nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar myi
299b8('bum): myod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar myi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag
300a1('bum): myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi gyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sdod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar myi spyod
300a2('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid myi stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid smon
300a3('bum): pa yod ces bya bar myi spyodaphyi nang stong pa nyid smond pa myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar myi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid myi dben zhes bya bar myi spyod
300a4('bum): pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la myi spyod de/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la myi spyod cing / pa nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ stong
300a5('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar myi gyod/ ngapa nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod
300a6('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar myi gyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
300a7('bum): ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar myi gyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar
300a8('bum): myi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid smond pa yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid smon pa myed ces bya bar myi
300b1('bum): gyod stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar myi rtsod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi dben zhes bya bar myi gyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la myi khyod de/ chen po stong pa nyid/
300b2('bum): kyi mtshan ma la myi gyod cing / chen po stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar myi gyod/ chen po stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar myi sdod/ chen po stong
300b3('bum): pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi sdod/ chen po stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar myi sdod/ chen po stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar myi gyod/ chen po stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar
300b4('bum): myi gyod/ chen po stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar bya gyod chen po stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid myi stong zhes bya bar myi gyod/ chen
300b5('bum): po stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi gyod/ chen po stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid smond pa yod ces bya bar myi gyod
300b6('bum): chen po stong pa nyid smond pa myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar myi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid myi dben zhes bya bar myi spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong
300b7('bum): pa nyid la myi spyod de// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la myi spyod cing / don dam pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar myi gyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar myi
300b8('bum): gyod don dam pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar myi myod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ don dam
301a1('bum): pa stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi gyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ don dam pa
301a2('bum): nyid stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid myi stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma
301a3('bum): myed ces bya bar myi gyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid smond pa yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid smon pa myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya
301a4('bum): bar myi gyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid myi dben zhes bya par myi spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la myi skyo da de/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la myi spyod
301a5('bum): cing / 'dus byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar myi da 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar myi skyo da 'dus byas stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar myi spyod
301a6('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ 'dus byas spyong
301a7('bum): pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi stong zhes bya bar myi spyong
301a8('bum): 'dus byasastong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid smond pa yod ces bya bar myi gyod
301b1('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid smond pa myed ces bya bar gyi byed/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar gyi gyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi dben zhes bya bar gyi spyod pa dang / 'dus
301b2('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid la myi gyod de/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la myi gyod cing / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar myi gyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi rtag
301b3('bum): ces bya bar myi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar myi gyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar myi spyod
301b4('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar myi gyod 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi gyod/ 'du sa ma byas stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi myong
301b5('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi stong zhes bya bar myi sdod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar
301b6('bum): myi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid smond pa yod ces bya bar myi gyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid smon pa myed ces bya
301b7('bum): bar myi myod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar myi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi dben zhes bya bar myi spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod
301b8('bum): de/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kye mtshan ma la myi gyod cing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mye spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar
302a1('bum): myi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar myi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong
302a2('bum): pa nyid bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar myi gyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong
302a3('bum): pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
302a4('bum): nying mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi myod/ mtha' las 'angs pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi myod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid smond pa yod ces bya
302a5('bum): bar myi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid smon pa myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa ste/ pa nyid dben zhes bya bar myi gyod/ mtha' las 'das
302a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid myi dben zhes bya bar myi spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la mye sdod de/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la myi spyod cing / thog ma dang
302a7('bum): ba ma myed pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ thog dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar myi spyod/ thog
302a8('bum): ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bdag myed ces
302b1('bum): bya bar gyi gyod/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar gyi rtsod/ thog ma dpa tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong
302b2('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyod/ dog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi stong zhes bya bar myi gyod/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi gyod/ thog ma dang tha ma myed
302b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed pa ces bya bar myi gyod/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba myi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid smon pa myed ces bya bar
302b4('bum): skye gyod/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar myi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa de nyid myi dben zhes bya bar myi gyod pa dang / dor ba myed
302b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod de/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kye mtshan ma la myi gyod cing / dor ba myed pa stong pa nye/ da rtag ces bya bar myi sdod/ dor ba myed pa stong pa
302b6('bum): nyid myi rtag ces bya bar myi sdod/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar myi spyod/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bdag ces
302b7('bum): bya bar myi gyod/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar myi gyod/ dor bamyed pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi gyod/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod
302b8('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar myi gyod/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi stong zhes bya bar myi gyod/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ dor ba
303a1('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid smon pa myed ces bya bar myi
303a2('bum): spyod/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar myi spyod/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi dben zhes bya bar myi gyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la myi spyod de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid
303a3('bum): kyi mtshan ma la myi spyod cing rang bzhin stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar myi gyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar myi spyod
303a4('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ rang ba zhin stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod
303a5('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ rang ba zhin stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi gyod/ rang bzhi na stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar myi gyod/ rang bzhin
303a6('bum): stong pa nyid myi stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid
303a7('bum): smond pa yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid smond pa myed ces bya bar myi gyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar myi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi dben zhes bya
303a8('bum): bar myi spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mya spyod de/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la myi spyod cing / chos thams cad stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/
303b1('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar myi gyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod/ chos
303b2('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar myi pyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ chos thams cad
303b3('bum): stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid
303b4('bum): mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ chos thams cad s+ho// nga pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi myod/ chos tham sa cad stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar myi sdod
303b5('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid smon pa myed ces bya bar myi s+yod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba/ ra myi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi dben
303b6('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong po nyid la myi myo'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la myi spyod cing / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar myi
303b7('bum): spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar myi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
303b8('bum): myi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod
304a1('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi stong zhes bya bar
304a2('bum): myi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid smond pa
304a3('bum): yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid smon pa myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar myi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi dbye
304a4('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyod pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyi de la myi spyod de/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la myi spyod cing / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid rtag
304a5('bum): ces bya bar myi spyod/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nye da bde zhes bya bar myi spyod/ myi dmyigs pa stong
304a6('bum): pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa
304a7('bum): nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi stong zhes bya bar myi

304b1('bum): bya bar myi gyod/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sdod/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar myi spyod/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi dben zhes bya bar
304b2('bum): myi spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod de/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la myi spyod cing / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ dngos

304b5('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ dngo sa po myed pa stong pa nyid myi stong zhes bya bar myi spyod
304b6('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi myod/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid smond pa yod ces bya bar

304b8('bum): bar myi spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la myi gyod de/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la myi gyod cing / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar myi gyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
305a1('bum): rtag ces bya bar myi gyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar myi gyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi snod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya
305a2('bum): bar myi gyor/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi pyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi gyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid

305b4('bum): pa nyid myi dben zhes bya bar myi spyod pa dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la myi spyod de/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la myi spyod cing

305b7('bum): bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams

306a1('bum): mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi gyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams smon pa myed ces bya bar myi spyod
306a2('bum): kha/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dben zhes bya bar myi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myi dben zhes bya bar myi spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la myi spyod de/ yang dag
306a3('bum): par spong ba rnams kyi mtshan ma la myi spyod cing / yang dag par spong ba rnams rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ yang dag par
306a4('bum): spong ba rnams bde zhes bya bar myi spyod/ yang dag/ par spong ba rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/

306a8('bum): ces bya bar gyi gyod yang dag par song ba rnams dben zhes bya bar gyi gyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi dben zhes bya bar gyi spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gyi
