358a7('bum): pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang
358a8('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
358b1('bum): dang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phye nang stong pa nyid
358b2('bum): dang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
358b3('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa
358b4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong po nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid s+ho nga pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
358b5('bum): myi 'jigs pa bzhil nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nye dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang
358b6('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa
358b7('bum): nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed
358b8('bum): po'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa
359a1('bum): nyid dang chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
359a2('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa
359a3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu snying rje chen po nang stong
359a4('bum): pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa
359a5('bum): dang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las la ngas pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong
359a6('bum): pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
359a7('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong
359a8('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma
359b1('bum): dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
359b2('bum): dang / dngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// de la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams myed pa la mngon
359b3('bum): bar zhend pas sred pa la mngon par zhend te/ de dag gis myed pa yongs su brtags pas/ myed pa la mngon par zhend cing / 'di lta ste chad pa dang rtag pa'i mtha' la chags pas/ de
359b4('bum): dag myi shes myi mthong ste/ gang myed pa'i chos de dag yongs su brtags na/ mying dang gzugs la mngon par zhend pa de dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par zhend to//
359b5('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par zhend to// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par zhen to// tshon 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par zhen to/
359b6('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par zhend to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par zhend to// nang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhend to// phye stong pa nyid la mngon
359b7('bum): zhend to// phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhend to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par zhend to// don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhes
359b8('bum): to/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa
360a1('bum): na spyad na smyan tu/ na sa cad
360a2('bum): bar zhen to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// ngo bo nyid stong
360a3('bum): pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// yang dag par spong ba rnams la
360a4('bum): mngon par zhen to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la ma ngon par zhen to// dbang po rnams la mngon par zhen to// stobs rnams la mngon par zhen to// byang chub kyi yan
360a5('bum): lag rnams la mngon par zhen to// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par zhen to// 'phags pa 'i bden pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// bsam gtan
360a6('bum): rnams la mngon par zhen to// tshad myed pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// rnam par b.rad pa rnams la mngon par 'an
360a7('bum): to/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa dgu la mngon par zhen to// stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la mngon par zhen to// mngon par shes pa rnams
360a8('bum): la mngon par zhen to// ting nge 'dzind rnams la mngon par zhen to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par zhen to// snying rje chen po la mngon par zhen to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
360b1('bum): rnams la mngon par zhen to// myi 'jigs pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mngon par zhen/
360b2('bum): to// de dag de ltar mngon par zhen pas/ yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la yongs su rtog ste/ de dag myi shes myi mthong ngo // ci myi shes myi mthong zhe na/ gzugs myi shes myi mthong
360b3('bum): tshor ba myi shes myi mthong ngo // 'du shes myi shes myi mthong ngo // 'du byed myi shes myi mthong ngo // rnam par shes pa myi shes myi mthong ngo // myig myi shes myi mthong ngo // rna ba myi shes myi mthong
360b4('bum): sna myi shes myi mthong ngo // lce myi shes myi mthong ngo // lu so myi shes myi mthong ngo // yid myi shes myi mthong ngo // gzugs myi shes myi mthong ngo // sgra myi shes myi mthong ngo /
360b5('bum): dri myi shes myi mthong ngo // ro myi shes myi mthong ngo // reg myi shes myi mthong ngo // chos myi shes myi mthong ngo // myig gau rnam par shes pa myi shes myi mthong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par
360b6('bum): shes pa myi shes myi mthong ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa myi shes myi mthong ngo // lce'i rnam par shes pa myi shes myi mthong ngo // lus kyi rnam par shes pa myi shes myi mthong ngo // yid kyi rnam par shes
360b7('bum): po myi shes myi mthong ngo // myig gi 'dus te reg po myi shes myi mthong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myi shes myi mthong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa myi shes myi mthong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg
360b8('bum): pa myi shes myi mthong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myi shes myi mthong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myi shes myi mthong ngo // myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi shes myi mthong ngo //
361a1('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi shes myi mthong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi shes myi mthong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba
361a2('bum): myi shes myi mthong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi shes myi mthong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi shes myi mthong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa skye
361a3('bum): shes myi mthong ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi shes myi mthong ngo // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa myi shes myi mthong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi shes myi mthong ngo /
361a4('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi shes myi mthong shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi shes kyi mthong ngo // nang stong pa nyid myi shes kyi mthong ngo // phyi stong pa nyid myi shes
361a5('bum): myi mthong ngo // phyi nang stong pa nyid myi shes myi mthong ngo // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi shes myi mthong ngo // chen po ste nga pa nyid myi shes myi mthong ngo // don dam pa stong pa nyid
361a6('bum): myi shes myi mthong ngo // 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi shes myi mthong ngo // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi shes myi mthong ngo // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi shes myi mthong ngo // thog ma dang
361a7('bum): ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi shes myi mthong ngo // dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi shes myi mthong ngo // rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi shes myi mthong ngo // chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi shes myi mthong ngo /
361a8('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi shes myi mthong ngo // myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi shes myi mthong ngo // dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi shes myi mthong ngo / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi shes myi mtho/
361b1('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi shes myi mthong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi myi shes myi mthong ngo // yang dag par spong ba bzhi myi shes myi mthong ngo // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi myi
361b2('bum): shes myi mthong ngo // dbang lnga myi shes myi mthong ngo // stobs lnga myi shes myi mthong ngo // byang chub kyi yan lag bdun myi shes myi mthong ngo // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi shes myi mthong
361b3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi shes myi mthong ngo // bsam gtan rnams myi shes myi mthong ngo // tshad myed pa rnams myi shes myi mthong ngo // gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi myi shes kyi
361b4('bum): mthong ngo // rnam par thard pa brgyad myi shes myi mthong ngo // mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myi shes myi mthong ngo // stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang /
361b5('bum): smond pa myed pa myi shes myi mthong ngo // mngon par shes pa rnams myi shes myi mthong ngo // ting nge 'dzind rnams myi shes myi mthong ngo // gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi shes myi
361b6('bum): mthong ngo // snying rje chen po myi shes myi mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myi shes myi mthong ngo // myi 'jigs pa bzhi myi shes myi mthong ngo // so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi myi shes
361b7('bum): myi mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myi shes myi mthong ngo // de ltar de dag ni byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'dod pa ste/ de dag 'byung ba ma yin no// gang nas byung ba ma yin na/
361b8('bum): na/ 'dod pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no// gzugs kyi khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no// gzugs myed pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no// nyan thos kyi sa nas 'byung ba ma yin no//
362a1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa nas 'byung ba ma yin no// de dag ni yid myi ches pa ste/ ji ltar yid myi ches zhe na/ gzugs gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// tshor ba/
362a2('bum): tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// rnam par shes pa rnam par
362a3('bum): shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// myig myig gis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// rna ba rna bas stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// sna snas stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so//
362a4('bum): lce lces stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// lus lus da kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// yid med kyis s+ho// nga zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// gzugs gzugs kyis
362a5('bum): stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// sgra sgras stong zhes bya/ bar yid myi ches so// dri dris stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// ro ros stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// reg reg
362a6('bum): gis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// chos chos kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// myig gi rnam par shes pa myig gi rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// rna ba'i rnam
362a7('bum): par shes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// sna'i rnam par shes pa sna'i rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// lce'i rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam par she
362a8('bum): pas stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar
362b1('bum): yid myi ches so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa myig gi 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so//
362b2('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lus
362b3('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myig gi
362b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar ye dmyi ches so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rna ba'i 'dus te reg po'i rkyend kyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar
362b5('bum): yid myi ches so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
362b6('bum): tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// lus kyi 'dus te reg po'i rkyend kyis tshor ba lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid
362b7('bum): myi ches so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa sbyin pa'i pha rol
362b8('bum): tu phyind pas stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pas stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bzod
363a1('bum): po'i pha rol tu phyind pas stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pas stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so//
363a2('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pas stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas stong zhes bya ba
363a3('bum): yid myi ches so// nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong
363a4('bum): papo nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// stong pa nyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid
363a5('bum): kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// don dam pa s+ho/ nga pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa
363a6('bum): nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'dra
363a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// dor ba myed pa stong
363a8('bum): pa nyid dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid
363b1('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa
363b2('bum): nyid myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong
363b3('bum): zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dran pa nye
363b4('bum): bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yi ci ches so// yang dag par spong ba bzhi yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
363b5('bum): bzhi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rna kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// dbang po lnga dbang po rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// stobs lnga stobs rnams kyis
363b6('bum): stong zhes bya bar yang myi tshas so// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun byang chub kyi yan rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yi mya ches so// 'phags po'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan
363b7('bum): lag brgyad pas stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// bsam gtan rnams bsam gtan rnas
363b8('bum): kyis stong zhes bya bar yid kyi ches so// tshad myed pa rnams tshad myed pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
364a1('bum): par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// rnam par thar da pa brgyad rnam par thar da pa brgyad kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// mthar da kyis gnas
364a2('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// rnam par thar da po'i sgo stong po nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed
364a3('bum): pa rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pas stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong zhes
364a4('bum): bya bar yid myi ches so// ting nge 'dzind rnams ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar med mye ches so// gzung sa kyai sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong zhes bya
364a5('bum): bar yid myi ches so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs pa/ cu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// myi 'jigs pa bzhi myi 'jigs pa
364a6('bum): bzhis stong zhes bya bar yid mya ches so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// snying rje chen po snying rje chen pos stong
364a7('bum): zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
364a8('bum): bu rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// phyir myi 'ong
364b1('bum): ba'i 'bras bu phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// dgra bcom pa nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid ches so// rang byang chub rang byang chub kyis
364b2('bum): stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yang myi ches so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
364b3('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// de dag na gnas pa ma yin pa ste/ ji ltar gnas pa ma yin zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas pa ma yin/
364b4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas pa ma yaM na/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas pa ma yi na/ bzon 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gan
364b5('bum): pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinadapa la gnas pa ma yin// nang stong pa nyid la
364b6('bum): gnas pa ma yin/ phye stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid la gnas pa
364b7('bum): ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong
364b8('bum): pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin
365a1('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ dngos po myed pa
365a2('bum): stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa ma yin//
365a3('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams la gnas pa ma
365a4('bum): yin/ stobs rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ byang chub kyai yan lag rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ 'phags pa l-i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pa ma yin/ 'phags
365a5('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas pa mo yin/ bsam gta na rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ tshad myed pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ gzugs myed po'i snyoms par 'jug
365a6('bum): pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la gnas pa ma yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas pa ma yin/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong po nyid
365a7('bum): dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa la gnas pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzind rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la
365a8('bum): gnas pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas pa ma yin// myi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas pa ma yin/ byams pa chen
365b1('bum): po la gnas pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po la gnas pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin no// de dag ni mngon par zhend pa yin te/ ji ltar mngon par
365b2('bum): zhend pa ma yin zhe na/ gzugs la mngon par zhend pa yin/ tshor ba la mngon par zhend po sen/ 'du shes la mngon par zhend pa yin/ 'du byed la mngon par zhend pa yin/ rnam
365b3('bum): par shes pa la mngon par zhend pa yin/ myig la mngon par zhend pa yin/ rna ba la mngon par zhend pa yin/ sna la mngon par zhend pa yin/ lce la mngon par zhend pa yin/ lus la
365b4('bum): mngon par zhend pa yin/ yid la mngon par zhen po yin gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sgral mngon par zhen pa yin/ dri la mngon par zhen pa yin/ ro la mngon par
365b5('bum): zhe nad pa yin/ reg la mngon par zhend pa yin/ cho sa la mngon par zhend pa yin/ myig gi khams la mdo/ na bar zhend pa yin/ gzugs kyi khams la mngon par
365b6('bum): zhend pa yin/ myig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la mdo na bar zhend pa yin/ rna ba'i khams la mngon par zhend pa yin/ sgra'i khams la mngon par zhend pa yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes
365b7('bum): po'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sna'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dri'i khams la mngon par zhend pa yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par zhend pa yin/ lce'i
365b8('bum): khams la mngon par zhend pa yin/ ro'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lce'i rnam par shes po'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lus kyi khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ reg
366a1('bum): bya'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ yid kyi khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ chos kyi khams la mad+mo//
366a2('bum): bar zhen pa yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'dod chags la mngon par zhen pa yin/ zhe sdang la mngon par zhen pa yin/ gti mug la mngon par
366a3('bum): zhen pa yin/ lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhend pa yin/ ma rig pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'du byed la mngon par zhend pa yin/ rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhend pa yin/
366a4('bum): mying dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin/ skye mchedad drug la mngon par zhend pa yin/ reg pa la mngon par zhend pa yin/ tshor ba la mngon par zhend pa yin/
366a5('bum): sred pa la mngon par zhend pa yin/ lend pa la mdo na par zhend pa yin/ srid pa mngon par zhend pa yinaskye ba la mngon par zhend pa yin/ rga shi la mngon par
366a6('bum): zhend pa yin// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par zhend pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par zhend po yin/ bzod po'i pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon
366a7('bum): bar zhan pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par zhend pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
366a8('bum): pa la mngon par zhe nad pa yin// nang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhend pa yin/ phyi stong po nyid la mngon par zhe nad pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhe nad po yan stong pa
366b1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhend pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par zhend pa yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhend pa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen/
366b2('bum): pa yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par zhend pa yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhend pa yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen
366b3('bum): pa yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhend pa yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par zhend pa yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par zhend pa yin/ rang gi
366b4('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhend pa yin/ mye dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhend pa yin/ dngo sa po myed pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhend pa yin
366b5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhe nad pa yin/ dngo sa po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhend pa yin// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon
366b6('bum): bar zhen pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon bar zhend pa yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par zhend pa yin// dbang po rnams la mngon par zhend pa yin
366b7('bum): stobs rnams la mngon par zhend pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par zhend pa yin/ 'phags po'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par zhend pa yin/ 'phags pa'i//
366b8('bum): bden pa rnams la mngon par zhand pa yin/ bsam gtan rnams la mngon par zhe nad po yin/ tshad myed pa rnams la mngon par zhe nad pa yin/ gzugs myed po'i snyoms par 'jug pa
367a1('bum): rnams la mngon par zhend pa yin/ rnam par thard pa brgyad la mngon par zhend pa yin/ mthar da kyis gnas po'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mngon par zhend pa yin
367a2('bum): rnam par tha rad po'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la mngon par zhend pa yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par zhend pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams pa
367a3('bum): mngon par zhend pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par zhend pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la mngon par zhend pa yin/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi la mngon par zhend pa yin
367a4('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la mngon par zhe nad pa yin byams pa chen po la mngon par zhe nad pa yin/ snying rje che na po la mngon par zhe nad po yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
367a5('bum): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mngon par zhend pa yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhend pa yin/ land cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhend pa
367a6('bum): yin/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhend pa yin/ dgra bco ba nyid la mngon par zhend pa yin/ rang byang chub la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mngon
367a7('bum): bar zhend pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la mngon par zhend pa yin/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mngon par zhend pa yin te// de'i phyir na byis pa
367a8('bum): zhes bya'o// gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi slob cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyidas
367b1('bum): kyi 'byung ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa kyi slob pa
367b2('bum): yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du myi 'byung ba yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
367b3('bum): lo myi slob pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du myi 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
367b4('bum): chen po thabs myi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen da/ bsam gta na gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtags shing mngon par
367b5('bum): zhe nad/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtag/ sa shing mngon par zhen/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ tshul khrims kyi
367b6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la brtags shing mngon par zhe nad/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen / nang stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen / phyi stong pa
367b7('bum): nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ chen po stong pa nyid la brtags
367b8('bum): shing mngon par zhen da / don dam pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen da/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la brtags shing 'amangon par zhend/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la brtags shing
368a1('bum): mngon par zhe na/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhe na / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhe nad/ dor ba
368a2('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhe na / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhan chos thams cad stong pa nyid la brtagaso shing mngon par zhe na rang gi
368a3('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhe na / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhend
368a4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhe nad/ dngos po myang po'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mdo na bar zhen / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la brtags/
368a5('bum): shing mngon par zhe na dang yang dag par spong ba rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen da/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rna mas la brtags shing mngon par zhen da/ dbang po rnams
368a6('bum): la brtags shing mngon par zhen da / stobs rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
368a7('bum): pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen da / bsam gtan rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhend/ tshad myed pa rnams la brtag/
368a8('bum): shing mngon par zhend/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhen / mthard kyis gnas pa'i
368b1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rnam par thard po'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la brtags shing mngon par zhend/ mngon par
368b2('bum): shes pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen / ting nge 'dzind rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhe nad/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o//
368b3('bum): stobs bcu la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi la brtags shing mngon par zhend/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ snying rje chen po la
368b4('bum): brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma'adres ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ thams cad shes pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhend
368b5('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhe nad rnam pa thams cad mkhyend po nyid la brtag/ sa shing mngon par zhend pas/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam
368b6('bum): grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du myi 'byung ba yin no// gsol da pa
368b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rnam pa gang gis slob par 'gyur ba lags/ ji ltar bslabs na rnas pa
368b8('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
369a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de myi dmyigs yang dag par rjes su myi mthong zhing / sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
369a2('bum): byind pa la de ltar slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi
369a3('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa de myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
369a4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen da pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
369a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi
369a6('bum): mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
369a7('bum): du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa de myi dmyigs shing yang dag par
369a8('bum): rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa to'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
369b1('bum): pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rolal tu phyind pa la 'gyod pa'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de myi dmyigs
369b2('bum): shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu byend pa la de ltar slob pa ni myo dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa
369b3('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa de myi
369b4('bum): dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ da ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/
369b5('bum): myaM dmyags pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend po nyid du 'byung ngo //
369b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po / sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang stong pa nyid la spyod
369b7('bum): po'i tshe nang stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la de ltar slob par
370a1('bum): ni myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/
370a2('bum): phyi stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ skye
370a3('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi nang stong pa nyid
370a4('bum): de myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni
370a5('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dang / 'a sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa
370a6('bum): tshe/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob
370a7('bum): bo ni myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chen po stong pa nyid la gyod pa'i tshe/ chen po stong
370a8('bum): pa nyid de myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni myi dmyigs pa'i
370b1('bum): tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don dam pa stong pa nyid la gyod pa'i tshe/ don dam pa stong pa nyid de
370b2('bum): myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su mye mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
370b3('bum): gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid do myi dmyig/
370b4('bum): shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ rtsi dmyigs pa'i tshul
370b5('bum): gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dus ma
370b6('bum): byas stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs
370b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtha' las 'dra
370b8('bum): pa stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mya dmyig
371a1('bum): tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/
371a2('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar
371a3('bum): slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs po'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i/
371a4('bum): tshe/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind
371a5('bum): pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa te/ 'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang bzhen
371a6('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
371a7('bum): pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad stong pa nyid la
371a8('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
371b1('bum): de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la
371b2('bum): gyod pa'i tshe/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
371b3('bum): de ltar slob pa ni/ gyi dmyigs pa'i chus gyes rnas pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bya byang chub sems drapal sems dpa' chen po mye myigs pa stong pa nyid la myong
371b4('bum): pa'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs shing ya nga dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang/ chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
371b5('bum): rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa 'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend po nyid du 'byung ngo / sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
371b6('bum): po dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do mya dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
371b7('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
371b8('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
372a1('bum): rold tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
372a2('bum): chen po dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
372a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub seMs
372a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams/ del spyod pa'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag myi ram+b+hi/ gas shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa
372a5('bum): ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes ra/ ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob po ni/ myi dmyi gas pa'i tshul rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung /
372a6('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag par song ba de dag myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa
372a7('bum): ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs po'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shar
372a8('bum): dra ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu
372b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob po ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu
372b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ dbang po de dag myi dmyigs shing / yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
372b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
372b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ stob sa de dag myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
372b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mye myi/ gas pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du// 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ses
372b6('bum): dpa' chen po byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi yan lag de dag myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' seMs
372b7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ kye dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal
372b8('bum): chen po 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de dag myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
373a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen bu nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu
373a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byung /
373a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mye dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu
373a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan de dag mya dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i
373a5('bum): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs po'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du
373a6('bum): 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad myed pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshad myed pa de dag myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ shar
373a7('bum): dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo //
373a8('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs myed pa'i snyoms 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag myi dmyigs shing yang
373b1('bum): dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa zas
373b2('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par tha rad pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par tha rad pa de dag myi dmyigs shing yang dag
373b3('bum): par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
373b4('bum): pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gyod pa'i tshe/ mtha rad kyis gnas
373b5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag myi dmyigs shi yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
373b6('bum): rol tu phyi nad pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par
373b7('bum): tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tha rad po'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed zhen/ myi dmyigs shing
373b8('bum): yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs po'i tshul gyis rnam pa zas
374a1('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa de dag myi
374a2('bum): dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
374a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzind rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzind de dag myi dmyigs shing
374a4('bum): yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chupa sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob po ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i
374a5('bum): tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo
374a6('bum): de dag myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rdzas su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i
374a7('bum): tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la pyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs
374a8('bum): po'i stobs bcu po de dag myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni
374b1('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa'i tshe/ myi 'jigs pa/
374b2('bum): bzhi po de dag myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs
374b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa'i cha/ so so yang dag
374b4('bum): par rig pa bzhi po de dag myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
374b5('bum): pa la slob po ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu bya/ nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen
374b6('bum): po la spyod po'i tshe/ snying rje chen po de dag myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dro ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
374b7('bum): la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
374b8('bum): pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
375a1('bum): kyai ga rol tu ldan pas de ltar thos pa na/ gas pa'i tshul rgyas nas mams cad ma khyend pa nyid du 'byung // ka ra dwa hU~M bu rtsang chub sems dpa
375a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po thams cad shes pa nyid la gyod po'i tshe/ thams cad shes pa nyid de myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' seMs
375a3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
375a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyodapo'i tshe/ laM gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid de myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu
375a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob po ni/ myi dmyigs pa 'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byungango //
375a6('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la gyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid de myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su
375a7('bum): myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob po ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
375a8('bum): pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob po ni/
375b1('bum): myi dmyigs po'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung
375b2('bum): ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs par
375b3('bum): tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid
375b4('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha
375b5('bum): ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs po'i tshul dang / rang ba zhin stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / chos
375b6('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i stong pa nyid myi dmyig pa'i tshul dang / dngos po myed pa'i stong
375b7('bum): pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa tshul dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du
375b8('bum): 'byung bar shes par bya'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya las/ le'u drug go//
376a1('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di
376a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom
376a3('bum): ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la/ ji skad du bstand par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu mo'i skyes bu 'di/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la skabs
376a4('bum): shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar 'a gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dre
376a5('bum): ba de la/ ji skad du bstand par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'ad sa la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslabs
376a6('bum): shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram mtshon/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dre ba de la ji skad du bstan
376a7('bum): par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar
376a8('bum): 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ zhes mtsho na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstand par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig

390b3('bum): yang gzhan ma lags ste/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyus nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das na ba'i 'dus te
390b4('bum): reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ smras yang gzhan ma lags ste/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma smras nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te
390b5('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma la gas/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags ste/ sna'i 'dus
390b6('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags
390b7('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags ste/ sde'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgra ma smra ma nyid kyang lho'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das lus kyi 'dus te reg
390b8('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags ste/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
391a1('bum): kyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
391a2('bum): tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sa'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags ste/ sa'i khams
391a3('bum): nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang sa'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das chu'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags ste/ chu'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang chu'i khams so// /
391a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das mye'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags ste/ mye'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang mye'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das rlung
391a5('bum): gi khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma/ lags ste/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i khas
391a6('bum): kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags ste/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang smra ma smra ma nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang
391a7('bum): gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags ste/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang smra ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa yang gzhan
391a8('bum): ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags ste/ ma rig pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang mi rig pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'du byed kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/

392a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang sbyin

396a7('bum): bslab pa ltar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bslab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga po de nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par
