396b1('bum): cad mkhye rang pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mI 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de 'di sngar phung po lnga po rnams mi dngos po ma
396b2('bum): mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhid de ni dmyigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rab 'byor dade ji gas du sems/ rmyil ma
396b3('bum): bu'i phung po lnga po de dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni myi 'gyuraro//
396b4('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar rmyil ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po sa mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmyigs su ma mchis so/
396b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ rab 'byord de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma lta bu'i phung po lnga po dang ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslabs shing /
396b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni myi 'gyur ro// de cal slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar sgyu ma ni
396b7('bum): dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmyigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du ses
396b8('bum): sgra brnyan lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni
397a1('bum): myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar sgra brnyan ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmyigs su mchis/
397a2('bum): so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ myig yor lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bsgrubs shing / rnam pa thams cad
397a3('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar myig yor ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang
397a4('bum): bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmyi/ gas su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ chu zla lta
397a5('bum): bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byu nga bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
397a6('bum): de ni myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar chu zla ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmyigs su ma mchis so// /
397a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ smyig rgyu lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams
397a8('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar smyig rgyu ni dngos po ma
397b1('bum): mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmyigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems
397b2('bum): sprul pa lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dra
397b3('bum): de ni myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar sprul pa ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmyigs su ma mchis
397b4('bum): so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dab/ 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ 'di ltar gzugs ni rmyi lam dawA bu/ tshor ba ni rmi lam lta bu/ 'du shes ni rmi lam lA
397b5('bum): gA/ 'du byed ni rmyi lam lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni myil sa lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po d+hA/ gra go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi/
397b6('bum): phyir myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs
397b7('bum): so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi
397b8('bum): phyir myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// chos thos
398a1('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid
398a2('bum): kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu/ tshor ba ni sgyu ma la
398a3('bum): bu/ 'du shes ni sgyu ma lta bu/ 'du byed ni sgyu ma lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa ni gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid
398a4('bum): kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyi dar stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// chen po stong po nyid
398a5('bum): kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myir/ myigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// mtha'
398a6('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir
398a7('bum): gyi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyi myigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi sder myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po
398a8('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga gzugs ni sgra brnyad
398b1('bum): su/ tshor ba ni swa ban+d+han wA bu/ cu shes ni sgra brnyan la Ta/ 'du byed mi smra brnyan sa zhu/ rnam par shes pa ni sgra brnyan stu bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de
398b2('bum): phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so//
398b3('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so//
398b4('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// thogs dang pa ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang
398b5('bum): bzhidi stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dasdigs so// chos thams da stong pa nyid kyi phyir gyi dmyigs so// rang gi ma tsham stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa
398b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir phyi dmyig/
398b7('bum): mo// rab 'byor dag zugs ni rtseg yor la su/ tshor ba ni myog sor wA bu/ 'du shes ni myig yor wA Ta/ 'du byed ni myig sor wA Ta/ rnam par shes pa ni mye ga sor sa bu n+te/
398b8('bum): par shes pa gang yin pa de 'i dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag mi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir gyi dmyigs so// kyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// phyi nang spong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dbyin pa/
399a1('bum): pa byam song pa nyid sa kyi mi dmyig go// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi
399a2('bum): dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs
399a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
399a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rab 'byord gzugs ni chu zla lta bu/ tshor ba ni chu zla lta bu 'du shes na chu zla lta bu/ 'du byed ni chu zla lta bu/ rnam par shes
399a5('bum): pa ni chu zla lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyis
399a6('bum): so/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi
399a7('bum): phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi
399b1('bum): dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so/
399b2('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang gi sa tshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi
399b3('bum): phyir myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de gzugs na smyig rgyu ba lta bu
399b4('bum): tshor ba ni smyig rgyu ba lta bu/ 'du shes ni smyig rgyu ba du lta bu/ 'du byed ni smyig rgyu ba lta bu/ rnam par shes/ pa ni smyig rgyu ba lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa
399b5('bum): ba de ni dbang po drug go// de na phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi
399b6('bum): phyir myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas
399b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa
399b8('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi
400a1('bum): dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyig so//
400a2('bum): 2ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de gzugs ni sprul pa lta bu/ tshor ba ni sprul pa lta bu
400a3('bum): 'du shes ni spruld pa lta bu/ 'du byed ni spruld pa lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni sprul pa lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de na dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni
400a4('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi myigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyis
400a5('bum): so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// don da ma pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong ba
400a6('bum): nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyis
400a7('bum): so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa
400a8('bum): nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyig so/
400b1('bum): gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas bstand pa 'di thos na 'jigs shing sngas dang skrag par myi 'gyur lags
400b2('bum): grang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor dgal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa yang yin la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyirang
400b3('bum): pa la thabs kyang myi mkhas pa zhig ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu yang ma 'ongs na/ 'jigs shing sdang ba dang skrag par yang 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub
400b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstand pa 'di thos na myi 'jigs kyi sdang myi skrag pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/ bcom
400b5('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor da 'di la bya nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna pa zas
400b6('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs kyi rtaka ces bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyigs so// tshor ba kyi rtag ces bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyigs so// 'du shes kyi
400b7('bum): taka ces bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyigs so// 'du byed kyi rtag ces bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtogs re/ de phyi dmyigs so//
400b8('bum): rab 'byor nga 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sos
401a1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtogs ste/
401a2('bum): de myi dmyigs so// tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyigs so// 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyigs so// 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
401a3('bum): rtogs ste/ de mya dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtogs ste/ de mya dmyigs so// rab 'byor da 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
401a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// da rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
401a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs bdag myed ces bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyig sa so// tshor ba bdag myed ces bya bar rtogs ste/
401a6('bum): de myi dmyigs so// 'du shes padag myed ces bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyigs so// 'du byed bdag myed ces bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa bdag myed
401a7('bum): ces bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab
401a8('bum): 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs 'ab
401b1('bum): zhes bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyigs so// tshor ba zhi pa zhes bya bar rtog pa 'o/ de mI dmyigs so// 'du shes zhi ba zhes bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyigs so// 'du byed zhi
401b2('bum): ba zhes bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyigs so/ rnam par shes pa zhi ba zhes bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
401b3('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
401b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyigazugs stong zhes bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa sa/
401b5('bum): sems kyis/ tshor ba song zhes bya bar rtogs ste/ myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid nga ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du shes stong zhes bya bar
401b6('bum): rtogs ste/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du byed stong zhes bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
401b7('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
401b8('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa sa
402a1('bum): cad mkhyedad pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs mtshan ma myed ces bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i seMs
402a2('bum): kyis/ tshor ba mtshan ma myed ces bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du shes mtshan ma myed ces bya bar rtogs ste/
402a3('bum): de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du byed mtshan ma myed ces bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
402a4('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma mye/ dad ces bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
402a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dang 'asems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
402a6('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyi dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs smond pa myed ces bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
402a7('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ tshor ba smon pa myed ces bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du shes smonang
402a8('bum): pa myed ces bya bar rtogs ste/ ngo myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du byed smon pa myed ces bya bar rtogs ste/ de mya
402b1('bum): dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ rnam par shes pa smon pa myed ces bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor
402b2('bum): 'dini byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nang pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
402b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyigs so/
402b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar rtogs ste/ de mya dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang //
402b5('bum): ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba mye/ da ces bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis
402b6('bum): 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ rnam par shes pa mtho bar 'du bya myed ces bya bar
402b7('bum): rtogs ste/ de kyi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub sems
402b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs dben zhes bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyig
403a1('bum): so/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ tshor ba dben zhes bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems
403a2('bum): kyis/ 'du shes dben zhes bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du byed dben zhes bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyigs so//
403a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
403a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' se dmas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
403a5('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i/ yid la bya bas/ gzugs myi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
403a6('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba myi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes kyi rtag/
403a7('bum): pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mthe dad pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed myi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa
403a8('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa myi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
403b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha ro lad tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i che/
403b2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa la med
403b3('bum): la bya bas/ tshor ba sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes sdug bsngal ba'i rnam
403b4('bum): par rtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa mas cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas du byed sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de rgyu
403b5('bum): dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du/ nga ldan pa'i sa la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsdu/ la ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so//
403b6('bum): rab 'byor nga 'di sa byeng chub sems dpa' sems dbu' chen po zhes rab kyi pha ro khrong tu bye da pa la spyod pa'i thabs mchis pa'o// rab 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
403b7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs bdag myed pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigaso//
403b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba bdag myed pa'i rna par rtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
404a1('bum): 'du shes bdage myed pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed bdag myed pa'i rnam par rtogs
404a2('bum): par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa bdag myed pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rab
404a3('bum): 'byor da 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor kazhwa lnga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
404a4('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ na pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba/ sa/ gzugs zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de mya
404a5('bum): dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba zhi ba'i rnam par rto gas par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thos
404a6('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
404a7('bum): 'du byed zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed
404a8('bum): de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems
404b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de myi
404b2('bum): dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de myi dmyig so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
404b3('bum): ba'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes stong pa 'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de sti dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhre nad pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed spyong pa'i rnam par rtogs
404b4('bum): par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa stong dpa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rab
404b5('bum): 'byor nga 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dang
404b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam par rtogs pa
404b7('bum): byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa
404b8('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
405a1('bum): pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyenan pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
405a2('bum): rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la
405a3('bum): spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang
405a4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs smond pa myed pa'i rnam dpar rtogs par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa zam das cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
405a5('bum): tshor ba smond pa myed pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de myi myigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan ba'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes smond pa myed pa'i
405a6('bum): rnam par rtogs par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rnas pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed spond pa myed pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de myi dmyigs so//
405a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byas/ rnam par shes pa smond pa myed pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da 'di ni byang chub sems
405a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
405b1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad
405b2('bum): mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa rnam pa tog pA byed de de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
405b3('bum): 'du shes mngon par 'dra ba myed pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba
405b4('bum): skyed pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya/ debs/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du ba myed pa'i
405b5('bum): rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// ba 'byor da 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' na po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
405b6('bum): zabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor du gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa/
405b7('bum): yid la bya bas/ gzugs dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba dben pa'i rnam par rtogs
405b8('bum): par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bas/ 'du shes dben pa'i rna par rtogs par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
406a1('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed dben ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de
406a2('bum): myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par
406a3('bum): sa pa dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da'adi ni byang chub
406a4('bum): mas dpal sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phya nad pa la spyod
406a5('bum): pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o//
